00188 INT32 GetFreeExplosion( void )
00189 {
00190       UINT32 uiCount;
00191 
00192       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumExplosions; uiCount++)
00193       {
00194             if(( gExplosionData[uiCount].fAllocated==FALSE ) )
00195                   return( (INT32)uiCount );
00196       }
00197 
00198       if( guiNumExplosions < NUM_EXPLOSION_SLOTS )
00199             return( (INT32) guiNumExplosions++ );
00200 
00201       return( -1 );
00202 }
00203 
00204 void RecountExplosions( void )
00205 {
00206       INT32 uiCount;
00207 
00208       for(uiCount=guiNumExplosions-1; (uiCount >=0) ; uiCount--)
00209       {
00210             if( ( gExplosionData[uiCount].fAllocated ) )
00211             {
00212                   guiNumExplosions=(UINT32)(uiCount+1);
00213                   break;
00214             }
00215       }
00216 }

00221 // GENERATE EXPLOSION
00222 void InternalIgniteExplosion( UINT8 ubOwner, INT16 sX, INT16 sY, INT16 sZ, INT16 sGridNo, UINT16 usItem, BOOLEAN fLocate, INT8 bLevel )
00223 {
00224       EXPLOSION_PARAMS  ExpParams ;
00225 
00226       // Callahan start
00227       // Double check that we are using an explosive!
00228       // Check if there is an explosive or an attacker
00229 
00230       if ( !( Item[ usItem ].usItemClass & IC_EXPLOSV ) && ubOwner == NOBODY )
00231       {
00232             return; // no explosive / no attacker
00233       }
00234 
00235       // Okay, we either got an explosive or a real attacker to check for.
00236       // Let's check for the attacker first.
00237       if (  ubOwner != NOBODY )
00238       {
00239             if ( !( Item[ usItem ].usItemClass & IC_EXPLOSV ) &&  AmmoTypes[MercPtrs[ubOwner]->inv[MercPtrs[ubOwner]->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].explosionSize < 2 )
00240             {
00241                   return; // no explosive and attackers gun is not fireing HE
00242             }
00243       }  
00244 
00245       // Increment attack counter...
00246       if (gubElementsOnExplosionQueue == 0)
00247       {
00248             // single explosion, disable sight until the end, and set flag
00249             // to check sight at end of attack
00250 
00251             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= (DISALLOW_SIGHT | CHECK_SIGHT_AT_END_OF_ATTACK);
00252       }
00253 
00254 
00255       gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
00256       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Incrementing Attack: Explosion gone off, COunt now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount ) );
00257 
00258 
00259       // OK, go on!
00260       ExpParams.uiFlags             = EXPLOSION_FLAG_USEABSPOS;
00261       ExpParams.ubOwner             = ubOwner;
00262 
00263       // No explosive but an attacker with HE ammo.
00264       if ( !( Item[ usItem ].usItemClass & IC_EXPLOSV ) && ubOwner != NOBODY)
00265       {
00266             ExpParams.ubTypeID = (INT8)Explosive[AmmoTypes[MercPtrs[ubOwner]->inv[MercPtrs[ubOwner]->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].highExplosive].ubAnimationID;
00267             //    return;
00268       }
00269       else // just normal explosives should get here
00270       {
00271             ExpParams.ubTypeID = (INT8)Explosive[ Item[ usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubAnimationID;
00272       }     
00273       // Callahan end
00274 
00275       ExpParams.sX                              = sX;
00276       ExpParams.sY                              = sY;
00277       ExpParams.sZ                              = sZ;
00278       ExpParams.sGridNo             = sGridNo;
00279       ExpParams.usItem              = usItem;
00280       ExpParams.fLocate             = fLocate;
00281       ExpParams.bLevel              = bLevel;
00282 
00283       GenerateExplosion( &ExpParams );
00284 }

00295 void GenerateExplosion( EXPLOSION_PARAMS *pExpParams )
00296 {
00297       EXPLOSIONTYPE           *pExplosion;
00298       UINT32            uiFlags;
00299       UINT8             ubOwner;
00300       UINT8             ubTypeID;
00301       INT16             sX;
00302       INT16             sY;
00303       INT16             sZ;
00304       INT16             sGridNo;
00305       UINT16            usItem;
00306       INT32             iIndex;
00307       INT8              bLevel;
00308 
00309       // Assign param values
00310       uiFlags                       = pExpParams->uiFlags;
00311       ubOwner                       = pExpParams->ubOwner;
00312       ubTypeID                = pExpParams->ubTypeID;
00313       sX                                  = pExpParams->sX;
00314       sY                                  = pExpParams->sY;
00315       sZ                                  = pExpParams->sZ;
00316       sGridNo                       = pExpParams->sGridNo;
00317       usItem                        = pExpParams->usItem;
00318       bLevel                        = pExpParams->bLevel;
00319 
00320 
00321       {
00322             // GET AND SETUP EXPLOSION INFO IN TABLE....
00323             iIndex = GetFreeExplosion( );
00324 
00325             if ( iIndex == -1 )
00326             {
00327                   return;
00328             }
00329 
00330             // OK, get pointer...
00331             pExplosion = &( gExplosionData[ iIndex ] );
00332 
00333             memset( pExplosion, 0, sizeof( EXPLOSIONTYPE ) );
00334 
00335             // Setup some data...
00336             memcpy( &(pExplosion->Params), pExpParams, sizeof( EXPLOSION_PARAMS ) ); 
00337             pExplosion->fAllocated = TRUE;
00338             pExplosion->iID = iIndex;
00339 
00340             GenerateExplosionFromExplosionPointer( pExplosion );
00341       }
00342       
00343       // ATE: Locate to explosion....
00344       if ( pExpParams->fLocate )
00345       {
00346             LocateGridNo( sGridNo );
00347       }
00348 }

00350 
00351 void GenerateExplosionFromExplosionPointer( EXPLOSIONTYPE *pExplosion )
00352 {
00353       UINT32            uiFlags;
00354       UINT8             ubOwner;
00355       UINT8             ubTypeID;
00356       INT16             sX;
00357       INT16             sY;
00358       INT16             sZ;
00359       INT16             sGridNo;
00360       UINT16            usItem;
00361       UINT8             ubTerrainType;
00362       INT8              bLevel;
00363   UINT32    uiSoundID;
00364 
00365       ANITILE_PARAMS    AniParams;
00366 
00367       // Assign param values
00368       uiFlags                       = pExplosion->Params.uiFlags;
00369       ubOwner                       = pExplosion->Params.ubOwner;
00370       ubTypeID                = pExplosion->Params.ubTypeID;
00371       sX                                  = pExplosion->Params.sX;
00372       sY                                  = pExplosion->Params.sY;
00373       sZ                                  = pExplosion->Params.sZ;
00374       sGridNo                       = pExplosion->Params.sGridNo;
00375       usItem                        = pExplosion->Params.usItem;
00376       bLevel                        = pExplosion->Params.bLevel;
00377 
00378   // If Z value given is 0 and bLevel > 0, make z heigher
00379   if ( sZ == 0 && bLevel > 0 )
00380   {
00381     sZ = ROOF_LEVEL_HEIGHT;
00382   }
00383 
00384       pExplosion->iLightID = -1;
00385 
00386       // OK, if we are over water.... use water explosion...
00387       ubTerrainType = GetTerrainType( sGridNo );
00388 
00389       // Setup explosion!
00390       memset( &AniParams, 0, sizeof( ANITILE_PARAMS ) );
00391 
00392       AniParams.sGridNo       = sGridNo;
00393       AniParams.ubLevelID           = ANI_TOPMOST_LEVEL;
00394       AniParams.sDelay        = gExpAniData[ ubTypeID ].sBlastSpeed; // Lesh: edit this line
00395       AniParams.sStartFrame   = pExplosion->sCurrentFrame;
00396       AniParams.uiFlags       = ANITILE_CACHEDTILE | ANITILE_FORWARD | ANITILE_EXPLOSION;
00397 
00398       if ( ubTerrainType == LOW_WATER || ubTerrainType == MED_WATER || ubTerrainType == DEEP_WATER )
00399       {
00400             // Change type to water explosion...
00401             ubTypeID = WATER_BLAST;
00402             AniParams.uiFlags |= ANITILE_ALWAYS_TRANSLUCENT;
00403       }
00404 
00405 
00406       if ( sZ < WALL_HEIGHT )
00407       {
00408             AniParams.uiFlags |= ANITILE_NOZBLITTER;
00409       }
00410 
00411       if ( uiFlags & EXPLOSION_FLAG_USEABSPOS )
00412       {
00413             AniParams.sX                                                      = sX;
00414             AniParams.sY                                                      = sY;
00415             AniParams.sZ                                                      = sZ;
00416 
00417             //AniParams.uiFlags                                         |= ANITILE_USEABSOLUTEPOS;
00418       }
00419 
00420       AniParams.ubKeyFrame1         = gExpAniData[ ubTypeID ].ubTransKeyFrame; // Lesh: edit this line
00421       AniParams.uiKeyFrame1Code     = ANI_KEYFRAME_BEGIN_TRANSLUCENCY;
00422 
00423       if ( !( uiFlags & EXPLOSION_FLAG_DISPLAYONLY ) )
00424       {
00425             AniParams.ubKeyFrame2         = gExpAniData[ ubTypeID ].ubDamageKeyFrame; // Lesh: edit this line
00426             AniParams.uiKeyFrame2Code     = ANI_KEYFRAME_BEGIN_DAMAGE;
00427       }
00428       AniParams.uiUserData    = usItem;
00429       AniParams.ubUserData2   = ubOwner;
00430       AniParams.uiUserData3   = pExplosion->iID;
00431 
00432 
00433       strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, gExpAniData[ ubTypeID ].zBlastFilename ); // Lesh: edit this line
00434 
00435       CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
00436 
00437       //  set light source for flashbangs.... or...
00438       if ( pExplosion->Params.ubTypeID == FLASHBANG_EXP )
00439       {
00440             pExplosion->iLightID = LightSpriteCreate("FLSHBANG.LHT", 0 );
00441       }
00442       else
00443             // generic light
00444             // DO ONLY IF WE'RE AT A GOOD LEVEL
00445             if ( ubAmbientLightLevel >= MIN_AMB_LEVEL_FOR_MERC_LIGHTS )
00446             {
00447                   pExplosion->iLightID = LightSpriteCreate("L-R04.LHT", 0 );
00448             }
00449 
00450       if( pExplosion->iLightID != -1 )
00451       {
00452             LightSpritePower     ( pExplosion->iLightID, TRUE );
00453             LightSpriteRoofStatus( pExplosion->iLightID, pExplosion->Params.bLevel );
00454             LightSpritePosition  ( pExplosion->iLightID, (INT16)(sX/CELL_X_SIZE), (INT16)(sY/CELL_Y_SIZE) );
00455       }
00456 
00457     // Lesh: sound randomization
00458     uiSoundID = gExpAniData[ ubTypeID ].uiExplosionSoundID;
00459 
00460     if ( gExpAniData[ ubTypeID ].uiAltExplosionSoundID != NO_ALT_SOUND )
00461     {
00462         // Randomize
00463         if ( Random( 2 ) == 0 )
00464         {
00465             uiSoundID = gExpAniData[ ubTypeID ].uiAltExplosionSoundID;
00466         }
00467     }
00468     // Lesh: sound randomization ends
00469       
00470       PlayJA2Sample( uiSoundID, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );               
00471 
00472 }

00476 void UpdateExplosionFrame( INT32 iIndex, INT16 sCurrentFrame )
00477 {
00478       gExplosionData[ iIndex ].sCurrentFrame = sCurrentFrame;
00479 
00480       // Lesh: make sparkling effect
00481       if ( gExplosionData[iIndex].Params.ubTypeID == FLASHBANG_EXP )
00482       {
00483             if ( gExplosionData[iIndex].iLightID != -1 )
00484             {
00485                   INT16 iX, iY;
00486                   iX = gExplosionData[iIndex].Params.sX/CELL_X_SIZE + Random(3) - 1;
00487                   iY = gExplosionData[iIndex].Params.sY/CELL_Y_SIZE + Random(3) - 1;
00488                   LightSpritePosition( gExplosionData[iIndex].iLightID, iX, iY);
00489             }
00490       }
00491 }
00492 
00493 void RemoveExplosionData( INT32 iIndex )
00494 {
00495       gExplosionData[ iIndex ].fAllocated = FALSE;
00496 
00497       if ( gExplosionData[ iIndex ].iLightID != -1 )
00498       {
00499             LightSpriteDestroy( gExplosionData[ iIndex ].iLightID );
00500       }
00501 
00502 }

00504 
00505 void HandleFencePartnerCheck( INT16 sStructGridNo )
00506 {
00507       STRUCTURE *pFenceStructure, *pFenceBaseStructure;
00508       LEVELNODE *pFenceNode;
00509       INT8        bFenceDestructionPartner = -1;
00510       UINT32      uiFenceType;
00511       UINT16      usTileIndex;
00512 
00513       pFenceStructure = FindStructure( sStructGridNo, STRUCTURE_FENCE );
00514 
00515       if ( pFenceStructure )
00516       {
00517             // How does our explosion partner look?
00518             if ( pFenceStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->bDestructionPartner < 0 )
00519             {
00520                   // Find level node.....
00521                   pFenceBaseStructure = FindBaseStructure( pFenceStructure );
00522 
00523                   // Get LEVELNODE for struct and remove!
00524                   pFenceNode = FindLevelNodeBasedOnStructure( pFenceBaseStructure->sGridNo, pFenceBaseStructure );
00525 
00526                   // Get type from index...
00527                   GetTileType( pFenceNode->usIndex, &uiFenceType );
00528 
00529                   bFenceDestructionPartner = -1 * ( pFenceBaseStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->bDestructionPartner );
00530 
00531                   // Get new index
00532                   GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( uiFenceType, (INT8)( bFenceDestructionPartner ), &usTileIndex );                          
00533 
00534                   //Set a flag indicating that the following changes are to go the the maps, temp file
00535                   ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( TRUE );
00536 
00537                   // Remove it!
00538                   RemoveStructFromLevelNode( pFenceBaseStructure->sGridNo, pFenceNode );
00539 
00540                   // Add it!
00541                   AddStructToHead( pFenceBaseStructure->sGridNo, (UINT16)( usTileIndex ) );
00542 
00543                   ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( FALSE );
00544             }
00545       }
00546 }

00550 
00551 BOOLEAN ExplosiveDamageStructureAtGridNo( STRUCTURE * pCurrent, STRUCTURE **ppNextCurrent,  INT16 sGridNo, INT16 sWoundAmt, UINT32 uiDist, BOOLEAN *pfRecompileMovementCosts, BOOLEAN fOnlyWalls, BOOLEAN fSubSequentMultiTilesTransitionDamage, UINT8 ubOwner, INT8 bLevel )
00552 {
00553       INT16 sX, sY;
00554       STRUCTURE         *pBase, *pWallStruct, *pAttached, *pAttachedBase;
00555       LEVELNODE *pNode = NULL, *pNewNode = NULL, *pAttachedNode;
00556       INT16 sNewGridNo, sStructGridNo;
00557       INT16 sNewIndex, sSubIndex;
00558       UINT16 usObjectIndex, usTileIndex;
00559       UINT8  ubNumberOfTiles, ubLoop;
00560       DB_STRUCTURE_TILE **    ppTile;
00561       INT8  bDestructionPartner=-1;
00562       INT8        bDamageReturnVal;
00563       BOOLEAN     fContinue;
00564       UINT32      uiTileType;
00565       INT16       sBaseGridNo;
00566       BOOLEAN     fExplosive;
00567 
00568       // ATE: Check for O3 statue for special damage..
00569       // note we do this check every time explosion goes off in game, but it's
00570       // an effiecnent check...
00571       if ( DoesO3SectorStatueExistHere( sGridNo ) && uiDist <= 1 )
00572       {
00573             ChangeO3SectorStatue( TRUE );
00574             return( TRUE );
00575       }
00576 
00577       // Get xy
00578       sX = CenterX( sGridNo );
00579       sY = CenterY( sGridNo );
00580 
00581       // ATE: Continue if we are only looking for walls
00582       if ( fOnlyWalls && !( pCurrent->fFlags & STRUCTURE_WALLSTUFF ) )
00583       {
00584             return( TRUE );
00585       }
00586 
00587       if ( bLevel > 0 )
00588       {
00589             return( TRUE );
00590       }
00591 
00592       // Is this a corpse?
00593       if ( ( pCurrent->fFlags & STRUCTURE_CORPSE ) && gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_BLOOD_N_GORE ] && sWoundAmt > 10 )
00594       {
00595             // Spray corpse in a fine mist....
00596             if ( uiDist <= 1 )
00597             {
00598                   // Remove corpse...
00599                   VaporizeCorpse( sGridNo, pCurrent->usStructureID );
00600             }
00601       }
00602       else if ( !( pCurrent->fFlags & STRUCTURE_PERSON ) )
00603       {
00604             // Damage structure!
00605             if ( ( bDamageReturnVal = DamageStructure( pCurrent, (UINT8)sWoundAmt, STRUCTURE_DAMAGE_EXPLOSION, sGridNo, sX, sY, NOBODY ) ) != 0 )
00606             {
00607                   fContinue = FALSE;
00608 
00609                   pBase = FindBaseStructure( pCurrent );
00610                   
00611                   sBaseGridNo = pBase->sGridNo;
00612 
00613                   // if the structure is openable, destroy all items there
00614                   if ( pBase->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPENABLE && !(pBase->fFlags & STRUCTURE_DOOR ) )
00615                   {
00616                         RemoveAllUnburiedItems( pBase->sGridNo, bLevel );
00617                   }
00618 
00619                   fExplosive = ( ( pCurrent->fFlags & STRUCTURE_EXPLOSIVE ) != 0 );
00620 
00621                   // Get LEVELNODE for struct and remove!
00622                   pNode = FindLevelNodeBasedOnStructure( pBase->sGridNo, pBase );
00623 
00624       // ATE: if we have completely destroyed a structure,
00625       // and this structure should have a in-between explosion partner,
00626       // make damage code 2 - which means only damaged - the normal explosion
00627       // spreading will cause it do use the proper peices..
00628       if ( bDamageReturnVal == 1 && pBase->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->bDestructionPartner < 0 )
00629       {
00630         bDamageReturnVal = 2;
00631       }
00632 
00633                   if ( bDamageReturnVal == 1 )
00634                   {
00635                         fContinue = TRUE;
00636                   }
00637                   // Check for a damaged looking graphic...
00638                   else if ( bDamageReturnVal == 2 )
00639                   {
00640                         if ( pBase->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->bDestructionPartner < 0 )
00641                         {
00642                               // We swap to another graphic!
00643                               // It's -ve and 1-based, change to +ve, 1 based
00644                               bDestructionPartner = ( -1 * pBase->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->bDestructionPartner );
00645 
00646                               GetTileType( pNode->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00647 
00648                               fContinue = 2;
00649                         }
00650                   }
00651 
00652                   if ( fContinue )
00653                   {
00654                         // Remove the beast!
00655                         while ( (*ppNextCurrent) != NULL && (*ppNextCurrent)->usStructureID == pCurrent->usStructureID )
00656                         {
00657                               // the next structure will also be deleted so we had better
00658                               // skip past it!
00659                               (*ppNextCurrent) = (*ppNextCurrent)->pNext;
00660                         }
00661 
00662                         // Replace with explosion debris if there are any....
00663                         // ( and there already sin;t explosion debris there.... )
00664                         if ( pBase->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->bDestructionPartner > 0 )
00665                         {
00666                               // Alrighty add!
00667                               
00668                               // Add to every gridno structure is in
00669                               ubNumberOfTiles = pBase->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubNumberOfTiles;
00670                               ppTile = pBase->pDBStructureRef->ppTile;
00671 
00672                               bDestructionPartner = pBase->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->bDestructionPartner;
00673 
00674                               // OK, destrcution index is , as default, the partner, until we go over the first set of explsion
00675                               // debris...
00676                               if ( bDestructionPartner > 39 )
00677                               {
00678                                     GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( SECONDEXPLDEBRIS, (INT8)( bDestructionPartner - 40 ), &usTileIndex );                           
00679                               }
00680                               else
00681                               {
00682                                     GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( FIRSTEXPLDEBRIS, bDestructionPartner, &usTileIndex );
00683                               }
00684 
00685                               // Free all the non-base tiles; the base tile is at pointer 0
00686                               for (ubLoop = BASE_TILE; ubLoop < ubNumberOfTiles; ubLoop++)
00687                               {
00688                                     if ( !(ppTile[ ubLoop ]->fFlags & TILE_ON_ROOF ) )
00689                                     {
00690                                           sStructGridNo = pBase->sGridNo + ppTile[ubLoop]->sPosRelToBase;
00691                                           // there might be two structures in this tile, one on each level, but we just want to
00692                                           // delete one on each pass
00693                                           
00694                                           if ( !TypeRangeExistsInObjectLayer( sStructGridNo, FIRSTEXPLDEBRIS, SECONDEXPLDEBRIS, &usObjectIndex ) )
00695                                           {
00696                                                 //Set a flag indicating that the following changes are to go the the maps, temp file
00697                                                 ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( TRUE );
00698 
00699                                                 AddObjectToHead( sStructGridNo, (UINT16)(usTileIndex + Random( 3 ) ) );
00700 
00701                                                 ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( FALSE );
00702                                           }
00703                                     }
00704                               }
00705 
00706                               // IF we are a wall, add debris for the other side
00707                               if ( pCurrent->fFlags & STRUCTURE_WALLSTUFF )
00708                               {
00709                                     switch( pCurrent->ubWallOrientation )
00710                                     {
00711                                           case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00712                                           case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00713 
00714                                                       sStructGridNo = NewGridNo( pBase->sGridNo, DirectionInc( SOUTH ) );
00715                                                       if ( !TypeRangeExistsInObjectLayer( sStructGridNo, FIRSTEXPLDEBRIS, SECONDEXPLDEBRIS, &usObjectIndex ) )
00716                                                       {
00717                                                             //Set a flag indicating that the following changes are to go the the maps, temp file
00718                                                             ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( TRUE );
00719 
00720                                                             AddObjectToHead( sStructGridNo, (UINT16)(usTileIndex + Random( 3 ) ) );
00721 
00722                                                             ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( FALSE );
00723                                                       }
00724                                                       break;
00725 
00726                                           case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00727                                           case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00728 
00729                                                       sStructGridNo = NewGridNo( pBase->sGridNo, DirectionInc( EAST ) );
00730                                                       if ( !TypeRangeExistsInObjectLayer( sStructGridNo, FIRSTEXPLDEBRIS, SECONDEXPLDEBRIS, &usObjectIndex ) )
00731                                                       {
00732                                                             //Set a flag indicating that the following changes are to go the the maps, temp file
00733                                                             ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( TRUE );
00734 
00735                                                             AddObjectToHead( sStructGridNo, (UINT16)(usTileIndex + Random( 3 ) ) );
00736 
00737                                                             ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( FALSE );
00738                                                       }
00739                                                       break;
00740                                     }
00741                               }
00742                         }
00743                         // Else look for fences, walk along them to change to destroyed peices...
00744                         else if ( pCurrent->fFlags & STRUCTURE_FENCE )
00745                         {
00746                               // walk along based on orientation
00747                               switch( pCurrent->ubWallOrientation )
00748                               {
00749                                     case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00750                                     case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00751 
00752                                                 sStructGridNo           = NewGridNo( pBase->sGridNo, DirectionInc( SOUTH ) );
00753                                                 HandleFencePartnerCheck( sStructGridNo );
00754                                                 sStructGridNo           = NewGridNo( pBase->sGridNo, DirectionInc( NORTH ) );
00755                                                 HandleFencePartnerCheck( sStructGridNo );
00756                                                 break;
00757 
00758                                     case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00759                                     case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00760 
00761                                                 sStructGridNo = NewGridNo( pBase->sGridNo, DirectionInc( EAST ) );
00762                                                 HandleFencePartnerCheck( sStructGridNo );
00763                                                 sStructGridNo = NewGridNo( pBase->sGridNo, DirectionInc( WEST ) );
00764                                                 HandleFencePartnerCheck( sStructGridNo );
00765                                                 break;
00766                               }
00767                         }
00768 
00769                         // OK, Check if this is a wall, then search and change other walls based on this
00770                         if ( pCurrent->fFlags & STRUCTURE_WALLSTUFF )
00771                         {
00772                               // ATE
00773                               // Remove any decals in tile....
00774                               // Use tile database for this as apposed to stuct data
00775                               RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( pBase->sGridNo, FIRSTWALLDECAL, FOURTHWALLDECAL );
00776                               RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( pBase->sGridNo, FIFTHWALLDECAL, EIGTHWALLDECAL );
00777 
00778                               // Alrighty, now do this
00779                               // Get orientation
00780                               // based on orientation, go either x or y dir
00781                               // check for wall in both _ve and -ve directions
00782                               // if found, replace!
00783                               switch( pCurrent->ubWallOrientation )
00784                               {
00785                                     case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00786                                     case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
00787                                                 
00788                                           // Move WEST
00789                                           sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( pBase->sGridNo, DirectionInc( WEST ) );
00790 
00791                                           pNewNode = GetWallLevelNodeAndStructOfSameOrientationAtGridno( sNewGridNo, pCurrent->ubWallOrientation, &pWallStruct );
00792 
00793                                           if ( pNewNode != NULL )
00794                                           {
00795                                                 if ( pWallStruct->fFlags & STRUCTURE_WALL )
00796                                                 {
00797                                                       if ( pCurrent->ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT )
00798                                                       {
00799                                                             sSubIndex = 48;
00800                                                       }
00801                                                       else
00802                                                       {
00803                                                             sSubIndex = 52;
00804                                                       }
00805 
00806                                                       // Replace!
00807                                                       GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( gTileDatabase[ pNewNode->usIndex ].fType, sSubIndex, (UINT16 *)&sNewIndex );
00808 
00809                                                       //Set a flag indicating that the following changes are to go the the maps temp file
00810                                                       ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( TRUE );
00811 
00812                                                       RemoveStructFromLevelNode( sNewGridNo, pNewNode );
00813                                                       AddWallToStructLayer( sNewGridNo, sNewIndex, TRUE );
00814 
00815                                                       ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( FALSE );
00816 
00817                                                 }
00818                                           }
00819 
00820                                           // Move in EAST
00821                                           sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( pBase->sGridNo, DirectionInc( EAST ) );
00822 
00823                                           pNewNode = GetWallLevelNodeAndStructOfSameOrientationAtGridno( sNewGridNo, pCurrent->ubWallOrientation, &pWallStruct );
00824 
00825                                           if ( pNewNode != NULL )
00826                                           {
00827                                                 if ( pWallStruct->fFlags & STRUCTURE_WALL )
00828                                                 {
00829                                                       if ( pCurrent->ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT )
00830                                                       {
00831                                                             sSubIndex = 49;
00832                                                       }
00833                                                       else
00834                                                       {
00835                                                             sSubIndex = 53;
00836                                                       }
00837 
00838                                                       // Replace!
00839                                                       GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( gTileDatabase[ pNewNode->usIndex ].fType, sSubIndex, (UINT16 *)&sNewIndex );
00840 
00841                                                       //Set a flag indicating that the following changes are to go the the maps, temp file
00842                                                       ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( TRUE );
00843 
00844                                                       RemoveStructFromLevelNode( sNewGridNo, pNewNode );
00845                                                       AddWallToStructLayer( sNewGridNo, sNewIndex, TRUE );
00846 
00847                                                       ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( FALSE );
00848                                                 }
00849                                           }
00850 
00851                                           // look for attached structures in same tile
00852                                           sNewGridNo = pBase->sGridNo;
00853                                           pAttached = FindStructure( sNewGridNo, STRUCTURE_ON_LEFT_WALL );
00854                                           while (pAttached)
00855                                           {
00856                                                 pAttachedBase = FindBaseStructure( pAttached );
00857                                                 if (pAttachedBase)
00858                                                 {
00859                                   // Remove the beast!
00860                                   while ( (*ppNextCurrent) != NULL && (*ppNextCurrent)->usStructureID == pAttachedBase->usStructureID )
00861                                   {
00862                                         // the next structure will also be deleted so we had better
00863                                         // skip past it!
00864                                         (*ppNextCurrent) = (*ppNextCurrent)->pNext;
00865                                   }
00866 
00867                                                       pAttachedNode = FindLevelNodeBasedOnStructure( pAttachedBase->sGridNo, pAttachedBase );
00868                                                       if (pAttachedNode)
00869                                                       {
00870                                                             ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( TRUE );
00871                                                             RemoveStructFromLevelNode( pAttachedBase->sGridNo, pAttachedNode );
00872                                                             ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( FALSE );
00873                                                       }
00874                                                       else
00875                                                       {
00876                                                             // error!
00877                                                             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00878                                                                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Problems removing structure attached to wall at %d", sNewGridNo );
00879                                                             #endif
00880                                                             break;
00881                                                       }
00882                                                 }
00883                                                 else
00884                                                 {
00885                                                       // error!
00886                                                       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00887                                                             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Problems removing structure attached to wall at %d", sNewGridNo );
00888                                                       #endif
00889                                                       break;
00890                                                 }
00891                                                 // search for another, from the start of the list
00892                                                 pAttached = FindStructure( sNewGridNo, STRUCTURE_ON_LEFT_WALL );
00893                                           }
00894 
00895                                           // Move in SOUTH, looking for attached structures to remove
00896                                           sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( pBase->sGridNo, DirectionInc( SOUTH ) );
00897                                           pAttached = FindStructure( sNewGridNo, STRUCTURE_ON_LEFT_WALL );
00898                                           while (pAttached)
00899                                           {
00900                                                 pAttachedBase = FindBaseStructure( pAttached );
00901                                                 if (pAttachedBase)
00902                                                 {
00903                                                       pAttachedNode = FindLevelNodeBasedOnStructure( pAttachedBase->sGridNo, pAttachedBase );
00904                                                       if (pAttachedNode)
00905                                                       {

00907                                                             RemoveStructFromLevelNode( pAttachedBase->sGridNo, pAttachedNode );

00915                                                             #endif

00918                                                 }

00924                                                       #endif
00925                                                       break;
00926                                                 }
00927                                                 // search for another, from the start of the list
00928                                                 pAttached = FindStructure( sNewGridNo, STRUCTURE_ON_LEFT_WALL );
00929                                           }
00930                                           break;
00931 
00932                                     case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
00933                                     case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:

00970

01000                                           while (pAttached)

01003                                                 if (pAttachedBase)

01071 
01072                               // CJC, Sept 16: if we destroy any wall of the brothel, make Kingpin's men hostile!
01073                               if ( gWorldSectorX == 5 && gWorldSectorY == MAP_ROW_C && gbWorldSectorZ == 0 )
01074                               {
01075                                     UINT8             ubRoom;
01076                                     BOOLEAN           fInRoom;
01077 
01078                                     fInRoom = InARoom( sGridNo, &ubRoom );
01079                                     if ( !fInRoom )
01080                                     {
01081                                           // try to south
01082                                           fInRoom = InARoom( (INT16)( sGridNo + DirectionInc( SOUTH ) ), &ubRoom );
01083                                           if ( !fInRoom )
01084                                           {
01085                                                 // try to east

01087                                           }

01091                                     {

01098                         // OK, we need to remove the water from the fountain 
01099                         // Lots of HARD CODING HERE :(
01100                         // Get tile type

01103                         if ( _stricmp( gTilesets[ giCurrentTilesetID ].TileSurfaceFilenames[ uiTileType ], "fount1.sti" ) == 0 )

01151                         // Rerender world!
01152                         // Reevaluate world movement costs, reduncency!
01153                         gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= NOHIDE_REDUNDENCY;
