01155                         InvalidateWorldRedundency( );
01156                         SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
01157                         // Handle properly lighting the structure that was modified
01158                         if( gbWorldSectorZ == 0 )
01159                         {
01160                               // ATE: make sure the lighting on the graphic gets updateds
01161                               LightSetBaseLevel( GetTimeOfDayAmbientLightLevel() );
01162                         }
01163                         else
01164                         {
01165                               LightSetBaseLevel( LightGetAmbient() );
01166                         }
01167                         // Movement costs!
01168                         ( *pfRecompileMovementCosts ) = TRUE;
01169 
01170                         {
01171                               // Make secondary explosion if eplosive....
01172                               if ( fExplosive )
01173                               {
01174                                     InternalIgniteExplosion( ubOwner, CenterX( sBaseGridNo ), CenterY( sBaseGridNo ), 0, sBaseGridNo, STRUCTURE_EXPLOSION, FALSE, bLevel );
01175                               }
01176                         }
01177 
01178                         if ( fContinue == 2 )
01179                         {
01180                               return( FALSE );
01181                         }
01182                   }
01183             
01184                   // 2 is NO DAMAGE
01185                   return( 2 );
01186             }
01187       }
01188 
01189       return( 1 );
01190       
01191 }
01192 
01193 STRUCTURE *gStruct;
01194 
01195 // Lesh: somewhere here once I got CTD when militia stepped on mine in cambria sam
01196 void ExplosiveDamageGridNo( INT16 sGridNo, INT16 sWoundAmt, UINT32 uiDist, BOOLEAN *pfRecompileMovementCosts, BOOLEAN fOnlyWalls, INT8 bMultiStructSpecialFlag, BOOLEAN fSubSequentMultiTilesTransitionDamage, UINT8 ubOwner, INT8 bLevel )
01197 {
01198       STRUCTURE               * pCurrent, *pNextCurrent, *pStructure;
01199       STRUCTURE *             pBaseStructure;
01200       INT16                   sDesiredLevel;
01201       DB_STRUCTURE_TILE **ppTile;
01202       UINT8                   ubLoop, ubLoop2;
01203       INT16                   sNewGridNo, sNewGridNo2, sBaseGridNo;
01204       BOOLEAN                       fToBreak = FALSE;
01205       BOOLEAN                       fMultiStructure = FALSE;
01206       UINT8                   ubNumberOfTiles;
01207       BOOLEAN                       fMultiStructSpecialFlag = FALSE;
01208       BOOLEAN                       fExplodeDamageReturn = FALSE;
01209       FILE                    *pDebug;
01210 
01211       pDebug = fopen("explosion.log", "wt");
01212       fprintf(pDebug, "ExplosiveDamageGridNo start\n");
01213       fclose(pDebug);
01214 
01215       // Based on distance away, damage any struct at this gridno
01216       // OK, loop through structures and damage!
01217       pCurrent           = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pStructureHead;
01218       sDesiredLevel      = STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND;
01219 
01220       pDebug = fopen("explosion.log", "a+t");
01221       fprintf(pDebug, "sGridNo  = %d\n", sGridNo);
01222       fprintf(pDebug, "pCurrent = %08X\n", pCurrent);
01223       fclose(pDebug);
01224 
01225       // This code gets a little hairy because 
01226       // (1) we might need to destroy the currently-examined structure
01227       while (pCurrent != NULL)
01228       {
01229             // ATE: These are for the chacks below for multi-structs....
01230             pBaseStructure = FindBaseStructure( pCurrent );
01231             pDebug = fopen("explosion.log", "a+t");
01232             fprintf(pDebug, "pBaseStructure = %08X\n", pBaseStructure);
01233             fclose(pDebug);
01234 
01235             if ( pBaseStructure )
01236             {
01237                   sBaseGridNo = pBaseStructure->sGridNo;
01238                   ubNumberOfTiles = pBaseStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubNumberOfTiles;
01239                   fMultiStructure = ( ( pBaseStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_MULTI ) != 0 );
01240                   ppTile = (DB_STRUCTURE_TILE **) MemAlloc( sizeof( DB_STRUCTURE_TILE ) * ubNumberOfTiles );
01241 
01242                   pDebug = fopen("explosion.log", "a+t");
01243                   fprintf(pDebug, "sBaseGridNo = %d\n", sBaseGridNo);
01244                   fprintf(pDebug, "ubNumberOfTiles = %d\n", ubNumberOfTiles);
01245                   fprintf(pDebug, "fMultiStructure = %d\n", fMultiStructure);
01246                   fprintf(pDebug, "ppTile = %08X\n", ppTile);
01247                   fprintf(pDebug, "pBaseStructure->pDBStructureRef->ppTile = %08X\n", pBaseStructure->pDBStructureRef->ppTile);
01248                   fclose(pDebug);
01249 
01250                   // Lesh: CTD was in next line once
01251                   memcpy( ppTile, pBaseStructure->pDBStructureRef->ppTile, sizeof( DB_STRUCTURE_TILE ) * ubNumberOfTiles );
01252 
01253                   if ( bMultiStructSpecialFlag == -1 )
01254                   {
01255                         // Set it!
01256                         bMultiStructSpecialFlag = ( ( pBaseStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SPECIAL ) != 0 );
01257                   }
01258 
01259                   if ( pBaseStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_EXPLOSIVE )
01260                   {
01261                         // ATE: Set hit points to zero....
01262                         pBaseStructure->ubHitPoints = 0;
01263                   }
01264             }
01265             else
01266             {
01267                   fMultiStructure = FALSE;
01268             }
01269 
01270             pNextCurrent = pCurrent->pNext;
01271             gStruct = pNextCurrent;
01272 
01273             // Check level!
01274             if (pCurrent->sCubeOffset == sDesiredLevel )
01275             {
01276                   fExplodeDamageReturn = ExplosiveDamageStructureAtGridNo( pCurrent, &pNextCurrent,  sGridNo, sWoundAmt, uiDist, pfRecompileMovementCosts, fOnlyWalls, 0, ubOwner, bLevel );
01277 
01278                   // Are we overwritting damage due to multi-tile...?
01279                   if ( fExplodeDamageReturn )
01280                   {
01281                         if ( fSubSequentMultiTilesTransitionDamage == 2)
01282                         {
01283                               fExplodeDamageReturn = 2;
01284                         }
01285                         else
01286                         {
01287                               fExplodeDamageReturn = 1;
01288                         }
01289                   }
01290 
01291                   if ( !fExplodeDamageReturn )
01292                   {
01293                         fToBreak = TRUE;
01294                   }
01295             }
01296 
01297             // OK, for multi-structs...
01298             // AND we took damage...
01299             if ( fMultiStructure && !fOnlyWalls && fExplodeDamageReturn == 0 )
01300             {
01301                   // ATE: Don't after first attack...
01302                   if ( uiDist > 1 )
01303                   {
01304                         if ( pBaseStructure )
01305                         {
01306                               MemFree( ppTile );
01307                         }
01308                         return;
01309                   }
01310 
01311                   {
01312 
01313                         for ( ubLoop = BASE_TILE; ubLoop < ubNumberOfTiles; ubLoop++)
01314                         {
01315                               sNewGridNo = sBaseGridNo + ppTile[ubLoop]->sPosRelToBase;
01316                               
01317                               // look in adjacent tiles
01318                               for ( ubLoop2 = 0; ubLoop2 < NUM_WORLD_DIRECTIONS; ubLoop2++ )
01319                               {
01320                                     sNewGridNo2 = NewGridNo( sNewGridNo, DirectionInc( ubLoop2 ) );
01321                                     if ( sNewGridNo2 != sNewGridNo && sNewGridNo2 != sGridNo )
01322                                     {
01323                                           pStructure = FindStructure( sNewGridNo2, STRUCTURE_MULTI );
01324                                           if ( pStructure ) 
01325                                           {
01326                                                 fMultiStructSpecialFlag = ( ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SPECIAL ) != 0 );
01327 
01328                                                 if ( ( bMultiStructSpecialFlag == fMultiStructSpecialFlag ) )
01329                                                 {
01330                                                       // If we just damaged it, use same damage value....
01331                                                       if ( fMultiStructSpecialFlag )
01332                                                       {
01333                                                             ExplosiveDamageGridNo( sNewGridNo2, sWoundAmt, uiDist, pfRecompileMovementCosts, fOnlyWalls, bMultiStructSpecialFlag, 1, ubOwner, bLevel );
01334                                                       }
01335                                                       else
01336                                                       {
01337                                                             ExplosiveDamageGridNo( sNewGridNo2, sWoundAmt, uiDist, pfRecompileMovementCosts, fOnlyWalls, bMultiStructSpecialFlag, 2, ubOwner, bLevel );
01338                                                       }
01339 
01340                                                       {
01341                                                             InternalIgniteExplosion( ubOwner, CenterX( sNewGridNo2 ), CenterY( sNewGridNo2 ), 0, sNewGridNo2, RDX, FALSE, bLevel );
01342                                                       }
01343 
01344                                                       fToBreak = TRUE;
01345                                                 }
01346                                           }
01347                                     }
01348                               }
01349                         }
01350                   }
01351                   if ( fToBreak )
01352                   {
01353                         break;
01354                   }
01355             }
01356 
01357             if ( pBaseStructure )
01358             {
01359                   MemFree( ppTile );
01360             }
01361 
01362             pCurrent = pNextCurrent;
01363       }
01364 
01365 
01366       pDebug = fopen("explosion.log", "a+t");
01367       fprintf(pDebug, "ExplosiveDamageGridNo finish\n");
01368       fclose(pDebug);
01369 }
01370 
01371 
01372 BOOLEAN DamageSoldierFromBlast( UINT8 ubPerson, UINT8 ubOwner, INT16 sBombGridNo, INT16 sWoundAmt, INT16 sBreathAmt, UINT32 uiDist, UINT16 usItem, INT16 sSubsequent )
01373 {
01374        SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01375        INT16 sNewWoundAmt = 0;
01376        UINT8      ubDirection;
01377        UINT8      ubSpecial = 0;
01378        BOOLEAN fInBuilding = InBuilding(sBombGridNo);
01379        BOOLEAN fFlashbang = Explosive[Item[usItem].ubClassIndex].ubType == EXPLOSV_FLASHBANG;
01380        UINT16 usHalfExplosionRadius;
01381 
01382        pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubPerson ];   // someone is here, and they're gonna get hurt
01383 
01384        if (!pSoldier->bActive || !pSoldier->bInSector || !pSoldier->bLife )
01385              return( FALSE );
01386 
01387        if ( pSoldier->ubMiscSoldierFlags & SOLDIER_MISC_HURT_BY_EXPLOSION )
01388        {
01389             // don't want to damage the guy twice
01390             return( FALSE );
01391        }
01392 
01393        // Lesh: if flashbang
01394        // check if soldier is outdoor and situated farther that half explosion radius and not underground
01395        usHalfExplosionRadius = Explosive[Item[usItem].ubClassIndex].ubRadius / 2;
01396        if ( fFlashbang && !gbWorldSectorZ && !fInBuilding && (UINT16)uiDist > usHalfExplosionRadius )
01397        {
01398             // then no effect
01399             return( FALSE );
01400        }
01401 
01402        // Direction to center of explosion
01403        ubDirection = (UINT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( sBombGridNo, pSoldier );
01404 
01405        // Increment attack counter...
01406        gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
01407        DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Incrementing Attack: Explosion dishing out damage, Count now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount ) );
01408 
01409        sNewWoundAmt = sWoundAmt - __min( sWoundAmt, 35 ) * ArmourVersusExplosivesPercent( pSoldier ) / 100;
01410        if ( sNewWoundAmt < 0 )
01411        {
01412             sNewWoundAmt = 0;
01413        }
01414 
01415        // Lesh: flashbang does affect on soldier or not - check it
01416        if ( (Item[usItem].usItemClass & IC_EXPLOSV) && fFlashbang )
01417        {
01418              ubSpecial = DetermineFlashbangEffect( pSoldier, ubDirection, fInBuilding);
01419        }
01420 
01421        EVENT_SoldierGotHit( pSoldier, usItem, sNewWoundAmt, sBreathAmt, ubDirection, (INT16)uiDist, ubOwner, ubSpecial, ANIM_CROUCH, sSubsequent, sBombGridNo );
01422 
01423        pSoldier->ubMiscSoldierFlags |= SOLDIER_MISC_HURT_BY_EXPLOSION;
01424 
01425        if ( ubOwner != NOBODY && MercPtrs[ ubOwner ]->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
01426        {
01427             ProcessImplicationsOfPCAttack( MercPtrs[ ubOwner ], &pSoldier, REASON_EXPLOSION );
01428        }
01429 
01430        return( TRUE );
01431 }
01432 
01433 BOOLEAN DishOutGasDamage( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, EXPLOSIVETYPE * pExplosive, INT16 sSubsequent, BOOLEAN fRecompileMovementCosts, INT16 sWoundAmt, INT16 sBreathAmt, UINT8 ubOwner )
01434 {
01435  INT8       bPosOfMask = NO_SLOT;
01436 
01437  if (!pSoldier->bActive || !pSoldier->bInSector || !pSoldier->bLife || AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
01438  {
01439        return( fRecompileMovementCosts );
01440  }
01441 
01442  if ( pExplosive->ubType == EXPLOSV_CREATUREGAS || pExplosive->ubType == EXPLOSV_BURNABLEGAS)
01443  {
01444        if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER )
01445        {
01446             // unaffected by own gas effects
01447             return( fRecompileMovementCosts );
01448        }
01449        if ( sSubsequent && pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags & HIT_BY_CREATUREGAS )
01450        {
01451             // already affected by creature gas this turn
01452             return( fRecompileMovementCosts );                    
01453        }
01454        if ( sSubsequent && pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags & HIT_BY_BURNABLEGAS )
01455        {
01456             // already affected by BURNABLEGAS this turn
01457             return( fRecompileMovementCosts );                    
01458        }
01459 
01460  }
01461  else // no gas mask help from creature attacks
01462       // ATE/CJC: gas stuff
01463       {
01464        if ( pExplosive->ubType == EXPLOSV_TEARGAS )
01465        {
01466              if ( AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
01467              {
01468                   return( fRecompileMovementCosts );
01469              }
01470             
01471             // ignore whether subsequent or not if hit this turn 
01472              if ( pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags & HIT_BY_TEARGAS )
01473              {
01474                   // already affected by creature gas this turn
01475                   return( fRecompileMovementCosts );                    
01476              }
01477        }
01478        else if ( pExplosive->ubType == EXPLOSV_MUSTGAS )
01479        {
01480              if ( AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
01481              {
01482                   return( fRecompileMovementCosts );
01483              }
01484             
01485              if ( sSubsequent && pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags & HIT_BY_MUSTARDGAS )
01486              {
01487                   // already affected by creature gas this turn
01488                   return( fRecompileMovementCosts );                    
01489              }
01490 
01491        }
01492       
01493        bPosOfMask = FindGasMask(pSoldier);
01494        if (  bPosOfMask == NO_SLOT || pSoldier->inv[ bPosOfMask ].bStatus[0] < USABLE )
01495        {
01496                   bPosOfMask = NO_SLOT;
01497        }
01498        //if ( pSoldier->inv[ HEAD1POS ].usItem == GASMASK && pSoldier->inv[ HEAD1POS ].bStatus[0] >= USABLE )
01499        //{
01500             //    bPosOfMask = HEAD1POS;
01501        //}
01502        //else if ( pSoldier->inv[ HEAD2POS ].usItem == GASMASK && pSoldier->inv[ HEAD2POS ].bStatus[0] >= USABLE )
01503        //{
01504             //    bPosOfMask = HEAD2POS;
01505        //}
01506 
01507        if ( bPosOfMask != NO_SLOT  )
01508        {
01509              if ( pSoldier->inv[ bPosOfMask ].bStatus[0] < GASMASK_MIN_STATUS )
01510              {
01511                    // GAS MASK reduces breath loss by its work% (it leaks if not at least 70%)
01512                    sBreathAmt = ( sBreathAmt * ( 100 - pSoldier->inv[ bPosOfMask ].bStatus[0] ) ) / 100;
01513                    if ( sBreathAmt > 500 )
01514                    {
01515                               // if at least 500 of breath damage got through
01516                               // the soldier within the blast radius is gassed for at least one
01517                               // turn, possibly more if it's tear gas (which hangs around a while)
01518                               pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_GASSED;
01519                    }
01520 
01521                    if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC )
01522                    {
01523 
01524                          if ( sWoundAmt > 1 )
01525                          {
01526                               pSoldier->inv[ bPosOfMask ].bStatus[0] -= (INT8) Random( 4 );
01527                               sWoundAmt = ( sWoundAmt * ( 100 -  pSoldier->inv[ bPosOfMask ].bStatus[0] ) ) / 100;
01528                          }
01529                          else if ( sWoundAmt == 1 )
01530                          {
01531                               pSoldier->inv[ bPosOfMask ].bStatus[0] -= (INT8) Random( 2 );
01532                          }
01533                    }
01534              }
01535              else
01536              {
01537                   sBreathAmt = 0;
01538                   if ( sWoundAmt > 0 )
01539                   {
01540                    if ( sWoundAmt == 1 )
01541                    {
01542                         pSoldier->inv[ bPosOfMask ].bStatus[0] -= (INT8) Random( 2 );
01543                    }
01544                    else
01545                    {
01546                         // use up gas mask
01547                         pSoldier->inv[ bPosOfMask ].bStatus[0] -= (INT8) Random( 4 );
01548                    }
01549                   }
01550                   sWoundAmt = 0;                            
01551              }
01552 
01553        }
01554       }
01555 
01556       if ( sWoundAmt != 0 || sBreathAmt != 0 )
01557       {
01558             switch( pExplosive->ubType )
01559             {
01560                   case EXPLOSV_CREATUREGAS:
01561                         pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags |= HIT_BY_CREATUREGAS;
01562                         break;
01563                   case EXPLOSV_TEARGAS:
01564                         pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags |= HIT_BY_TEARGAS;
01565                         break;
01566                   case EXPLOSV_MUSTGAS:
01567                         pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags |= HIT_BY_MUSTARDGAS;
01568                         break;
01569                   case EXPLOSV_BURNABLEGAS:
01570                         pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags |= HIT_BY_BURNABLEGAS;
01571                         break;
01572                   default:
01573                         break;
01574             }
01575             
01576             //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"ExpControl pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags: %d", pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags );     
01577 
01578             // a gas effect, take damage directly...
01579             SoldierTakeDamage( pSoldier, ANIM_STAND, sWoundAmt, sBreathAmt, TAKE_DAMAGE_GAS, NOBODY, NOWHERE, 0, TRUE );
01580 
01581             if ( pSoldier->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )
01582             {
01583                   DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, (INT8)( BATTLE_SOUND_HIT1 + Random( 2 ) ) );
01584             }
01585 
01586         if ( ubOwner != NOBODY && MercPtrs[ ubOwner ]->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
01587         {
01588               ProcessImplicationsOfPCAttack( MercPtrs[ ubOwner ], &pSoldier, REASON_EXPLOSION );
01589         }
01590       }
01591       return( fRecompileMovementCosts );
01592 }
01593 
01594 BOOLEAN ExpAffect( INT16 sBombGridNo, INT16 sGridNo, UINT32 uiDist, UINT16 usItem, UINT8 ubOwner,  INT16 sSubsequent, BOOLEAN *pfMercHit, INT8 bLevel, INT32 iSmokeEffectID )
01595 {
01596       INT16 sWoundAmt = 0,sBreathAmt = 0, sNewWoundAmt = 0, sNewBreathAmt = 0, sStructDmgAmt;
01597       UINT8 ubPerson;
01598       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01599       EXPLOSIVETYPE *pExplosive;
01600       INT16 sX, sY;
01601       BOOLEAN fRecompileMovementCosts = FALSE;
01602       BOOLEAN fSmokeEffect = FALSE;
01603       BOOLEAN fStunEffect  = FALSE;
01604       BOOLEAN     fBlastEffect = TRUE;
01605       BOOLEAN     fBloodEffect = FALSE;
01606       INT8  bSmokeEffectType = 0;
01607       INT16 sNewGridNo;
01608       ITEM_POOL * pItemPool, * pItemPoolNext;
01609       UINT32      uiRoll;
01610 
01611       //Init the variables
01612       sX = sY = -1;
01613 
01614       if ( sSubsequent == BLOOD_SPREAD_EFFECT )
01615       {
01616             fSmokeEffect                  = FALSE;
01617             fBlastEffect                  = FALSE;
01618             fBloodEffect                  = TRUE;
01619       }
01620       else
01621       {
01622              // Turn off blast effect if some types of items...
01623              switch( Explosive[Item[usItem].ubClassIndex].ubType  )
01624              {
01625                         case EXPLOSV_MUSTGAS:
01626 
01627                               fSmokeEffect                  = TRUE;
01628                               bSmokeEffectType  =     MUSTARDGAS_SMOKE_EFFECT; 
01629                               fBlastEffect                  = FALSE;
01630                               break;
01631 
01632                         case EXPLOSV_BURNABLEGAS:
01633 
01634                               fSmokeEffect                  = TRUE;
01635                               bSmokeEffectType  =     BURNABLEGAS_SMOKE_EFFECT; 
01636                               fBlastEffect                  = FALSE;
01637                               break;
01638 
01639                         case EXPLOSV_TEARGAS:
01640 
01641                               fSmokeEffect                  = TRUE;
01642                               bSmokeEffectType  =     TEARGAS_SMOKE_EFFECT; 
01643                               fBlastEffect                  = FALSE;
01644                               break;
01645 
01646                         case EXPLOSV_SMOKE:
01647 
01648                               fSmokeEffect                  = TRUE;
01649                               bSmokeEffectType  =     NORMAL_SMOKE_EFFECT; 
01650                               fBlastEffect                  = FALSE;
01651                               break;
01652 
01653                         case EXPLOSV_STUN:
01654                               fStunEffect                   = TRUE;
01655                               break;
01656       
01657                       case EXPLOSV_CREATUREGAS:
01658 
01659                               fSmokeEffect                  = TRUE;
01660                               bSmokeEffectType  =     CREATURE_SMOKE_EFFECT; 
01661                               fBlastEffect                  = FALSE;
01662                       break;
01663              }
01664       }
01665 
01666 
01667       // OK, here we:
01668       // Get explosive data from table
01669       pExplosive = &(Explosive[ Item[ usItem ].ubClassIndex ] );
01670 
01671       uiRoll = PreRandom( 100 );
01672 
01673       // Calculate wound amount
01674       INT16 newDamage = pExplosive->ubDamage + (INT16)(( pExplosive->ubDamage * gGameExternalOptions.ubExplosivesDamageMultiplier) / 100); //lal
01675       
01676       sWoundAmt = newDamage + (INT16) ( (newDamage * uiRoll) / 100 );
01677       
01678       
01679       
01680       // Calculate breath amount ( if stun damage applicable )
01681       INT16 newBreath = pExplosive->ubStunDamage + (INT16)(( pExplosive->ubStunDamage * gGameExternalOptions.ubExplosivesDamageMultiplier) / 100); //lal
01682       
01683       sBreathAmt = ( newBreath * 100 ) + (INT16) ( ( ( newBreath / 2 ) * 100 * uiRoll ) / 100 ) ;
01684             
01685 
01686   // ATE: Make sure guys get pissed at us!
01687   HandleBuldingDestruction( sGridNo ,ubOwner );
01688 
01689 
01690       if ( fBlastEffect )
01691       {
01692             // lower effects for distance away from center of explosion
01693             // If radius is 3, damage % is (100)/66/33/17
01694             // If radius is 5, damage % is (100)/80/60/40/20/10
01695             // If radius is 8, damage % is (100)/88/75/63/50/37/25/13/6
01696 
01697             if ( pExplosive->ubRadius == 0 )
01698             {
01699                   // leave as is, has to be at range 0 here
01700             }
01701             else if (uiDist < pExplosive->ubRadius)
01702             {
01703                   // if radius is 5, go down by 5ths ~ 20%
01704                   sWoundAmt -= (INT16)  (sWoundAmt * uiDist / pExplosive->ubRadius );
01705                   sBreathAmt -= (INT16) (sBreathAmt * uiDist / pExplosive->ubRadius );
01706             }
01707             else
01708             {
01709                   // at the edge of the explosion, do half the previous damage
01710                   sWoundAmt = (INT16) ( (sWoundAmt / pExplosive->ubRadius) / 2);
01711                   sBreathAmt = (INT16) ( (sBreathAmt / pExplosive->ubRadius) / 2);
01712             }
01713 
01714             if (sWoundAmt < 0)
01715                   sWoundAmt = 0;
01716 
01717             if (sBreathAmt < 0)
01718                   sBreathAmt = 0;
01719 
01720             // damage structures
01721             if ( uiDist <= __max( 1, (UINT32) (newDamage / 30) ) )
01722             {
01723                   if ( Item[ usItem ].usItemClass & IC_GRENADE )
01724                   {
01725                         sStructDmgAmt = sWoundAmt / 3;                        
01726                   }
01727                   else // most explosives
01728                   {
01729                         sStructDmgAmt = sWoundAmt;
01730                   }
01731                   
01732                   ExplosiveDamageGridNo( sGridNo, sStructDmgAmt, uiDist, &fRecompileMovementCosts, FALSE, -1, 0 , ubOwner, bLevel );
01733 
01734                   // ATE: Look for damage to walls ONLY for next two gridnos
01735                   sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( NORTH ) );
01736 
01737                   if ( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( sNewGridNo ) )
01738                   {
01739                         ExplosiveDamageGridNo( sNewGridNo, sStructDmgAmt, uiDist, &fRecompileMovementCosts, TRUE, -1, 0, ubOwner, bLevel );
01740                   }
01741 
01742                   // ATE: Look for damage to walls ONLY for next two gridnos
01743                   sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( WEST ) );
01744 
01745                   if ( GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( sNewGridNo ) )
01746                   {
01747                         ExplosiveDamageGridNo( sNewGridNo, sStructDmgAmt, uiDist, &fRecompileMovementCosts, TRUE, -1, 0, ubOwner, bLevel );
01748                   }
01749 
01750             }
01751 
01752             // Add burn marks to ground randomly....
01753             if ( Random( 50 ) < 15 && uiDist == 1 )
01754             {
01755                   //if ( !TypeRangeExistsInObjectLayer( sGridNo, FIRSTEXPLDEBRIS, SECONDEXPLDEBRIS, &usObjectIndex ) )
01756                   //{
01757                   //    GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( SECONDEXPLDEBRIS, (UINT16)( Random( 10 ) + 1 ), &usTileIndex );
01758                   //    AddObjectToHead( sGridNo, usTileIndex );
01759 
01760                   //    SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL);
01761 
01762                   //}
01763             }
01764 
01765             // NB radius can be 0 so cannot divide it by 2 here
01766             if (!fStunEffect && (uiDist * 2 <= pExplosive->ubRadius)  )
01767             {
01768                   GetItemPool( sGridNo, &pItemPool, bLevel );
01769 
01770                   while( pItemPool )
01771                   {
01772                         pItemPoolNext = pItemPool->pNext;
01773 
01774                         if ( DamageItemOnGround( &(gWorldItems[ pItemPool->iItemIndex ].o), sGridNo, bLevel, (INT32) (sWoundAmt * 2), ubOwner ) )
01775                         {
01776                               // item was destroyed
01777                               RemoveItemFromPool( sGridNo, pItemPool->iItemIndex, bLevel );
01778                         }
01779                         pItemPool = pItemPoolNext;
01780                   }
01781 
01782                   /*
01783                   // Search for an explosive item in item pool
01784                   while ( ( iWorldItem = GetItemOfClassTypeInPool( sGridNo, IC_EXPLOSV, bLevel ) ) != -1 )
01785                   {
01786                         // Get usItem
01787                         usItem = gWorldItems[ iWorldItem ].o.usItem;
01788 
01789                         DamageItem
01790 
01791                         if ( CheckForChainReaction( usItem, gWorldItems[ iWorldItem ].o.bStatus[0], sWoundAmt, TRUE ) )
01792                         {
01793                               RemoveItemFromPool( sGridNo, iWorldItem, bLevel );
01794 
01795                               // OK, Ignite this explosion!
01796                               IgniteExplosion( NOBODY, sX, sY, 0, sGridNo, usItem, bLevel );
01797                         }
01798                         else
01799                         {
01800                               RemoveItemFromPool( sGridNo, iWorldItem, bLevel );
01801                         }
01802 
01803                   }
01804 
01805                   // Remove any unburied items here!
01806                   RemoveAllUnburiedItems( sGridNo, bLevel );
01807                   */
01808             }
01809  }
01810  else if ( fSmokeEffect )
01811  {
01812             // If tear gar, determine turns to spread.....
01813             if ( sSubsequent == ERASE_SPREAD_EFFECT )
01814             {
01815                   RemoveSmokeEffectFromTile( sGridNo, bLevel );
01816             }
01817             else if ( sSubsequent != REDO_SPREAD_EFFECT )
01818             {
01819                   AddSmokeEffectToTile( iSmokeEffectID, bSmokeEffectType, sGridNo, bLevel );
01820             }
01821  }
01822  else
01823  {
01824             // Drop blood ....
01825         // Get blood quantity....
01826             InternalDropBlood( sGridNo, 0, 0, (UINT8)(__max( ( MAXBLOODQUANTITY - ( uiDist * 2 ) ), 0 ) ), 1 );
01827  }
01828 
01829  if ( sSubsequent != ERASE_SPREAD_EFFECT && sSubsequent != BLOOD_SPREAD_EFFECT )
01830  {
01831        // if an explosion effect....
01832        if ( fBlastEffect )
01833        {
01834              // don't hurt anyone who is already dead & waiting to be removed
01835              if ( ( ubPerson = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, bLevel ) ) != NOBODY )
01836              {
01837                    DamageSoldierFromBlast( ubPerson, ubOwner, sBombGridNo, sWoundAmt, sBreathAmt, uiDist, usItem, sSubsequent );
01838              }
01839 
01840              if ( bLevel == 1 )
01841              {
01842                    if ( ( ubPerson = WhoIsThere2(sGridNo, 0 ) ) != NOBODY )
01843                    {
01844                          if ( (sWoundAmt / 2) > 20 )
01845                          {
01846                                // debris damage!
01847                                if ( (sBreathAmt / 2) > 20 )
01848                                {
01849                                      DamageSoldierFromBlast( ubPerson, ubOwner, sBombGridNo, (INT16) Random( (sWoundAmt / 2) - 20 ), (INT16) Random( (sBreathAmt / 2) - 20 ), uiDist, usItem, sSubsequent );
01850                                }
01851                                else
01852                                {
01853                                      DamageSoldierFromBlast( ubPerson, ubOwner, sBombGridNo, (INT16) Random( (sWoundAmt / 2) - 20 ), 1, uiDist, usItem, sSubsequent );
01854                                }
01855                         
01856                          }
01857 
01858                    }
01859              }
01860        }
01861        else
01862        {
01863              if ( ( ubPerson = WhoIsThere2(sGridNo, bLevel ) ) >= NOBODY )
01864              {
01865                    return( fRecompileMovementCosts );
01866              }
01867 
01868              pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubPerson ];   // someone is here, and they're gonna get hurt
01869 
01870              fRecompileMovementCosts = DishOutGasDamage( pSoldier, pExplosive, sSubsequent, fRecompileMovementCosts, sWoundAmt, sBreathAmt, ubOwner );
01871 /*
01872              if (!pSoldier->bActive || !pSoldier->bInSector || !pSoldier->bLife || AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
01873              {
01874                    return( fRecompileMovementCosts );
01875              }
01876 
01877              if ( pExplosive->ubType == EXPLOSV_CREATUREGAS )
01878              {
01879                    if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER )
01880                    {
01881                         // unaffected by own gas effects
01882                         return( fRecompileMovementCosts );
01883                    }
01884                    if ( sSubsequent && pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags & HIT_BY_CREATUREGAS )
01885                    {
01886                         // already affected by creature gas this turn
01887                         return( fRecompileMovementCosts );                    
01888                    }
01889              }
01890              else // no gas mask help from creature attacks
01891                   // ATE/CJC: gas stuff
01892                   {
01893                    INT8 bPosOfMask = NO_SLOT;
01894 
01895 
01896                    if ( pExplosive->ubType == EXPLOSV_TEARGAS )
01897                    {
01898                         // ignore whether subsequent or not if hit this turn 
01899                          if ( pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags & HIT_BY_TEARGAS )
01900                          {
01901                               // already affected by creature gas this turn
01902                               return( fRecompileMovementCosts );                    
01903                          }
01904                    }
01905                    else if ( pExplosive->ubType == EXPLOSV_MUSTGAS )
01906                    {
01907                          if ( sSubsequent && pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags & HIT_BY_MUSTARDGAS )
01908                          {
01909                               // already affected by creature gas this turn
01910                               return( fRecompileMovementCosts );                    
01911                          }
01912 
01913                    }
01914                   
01915                    if ( sSubsequent && pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags & HIT_BY_CREATUREGAS )
01916                    {
01917                         // already affected by creature gas this turn
01918                         return( fRecompileMovementCosts );                    
01919                    }
01920 
01921 
01922                    if ( pSoldier->inv[ HEAD1POS ].usItem == GASMASK && pSoldier->inv[ HEAD1POS ].bStatus[0] >= USABLE )
01923                    {
01924                               bPosOfMask = HEAD1POS;
01925                    }
01926                    else if ( pSoldier->inv[ HEAD2POS ].usItem == GASMASK && pSoldier->inv[ HEAD2POS ].bStatus[0] >= USABLE )
01927                    {
01928                               bPosOfMask = HEAD2POS;
01929                    }
01930 
01931                    if ( bPosOfMask != NO_SLOT  )
01932                    {
01933                          if ( pSoldier->inv[ bPosOfMask ].bStatus[0] < GASMASK_MIN_STATUS )
01934                          {
01935                                // GAS MASK reduces breath loss by its work% (it leaks if not at least 70%)
01936                                sBreathAmt = ( sBreathAmt * ( 100 - pSoldier->inv[ bPosOfMask ].bStatus[0] ) ) / 100;
01937                                if ( sBreathAmt > 500 )
01938                                {
01939                                           // if at least 500 of breath damage got through
01940                                           // the soldier within the blast radius is gassed for at least one
01941                                           // turn, possibly more if it's tear gas (which hangs around a while)
01942                                           pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_GASSED;
01943                                }
01944 
01945                                if ( sWoundAmt > 1 )
01946                                {
01947                                 pSoldier->inv[ bPosOfMask ].bStatus[0] -= (INT8) Random( 4 );
01948                                     sWoundAmt = ( sWoundAmt * ( 100 -  pSoldier->inv[ bPosOfMask ].bStatus[0] ) ) / 100;
01949                                }
01950                                else if ( sWoundAmt == 1 )
01951                                {
01952                                     pSoldier->inv[ bPosOfMask ].bStatus[0] -= (INT8) Random( 2 );
01953                                }
01954                          }
01955                          else
01956                          {
01957                               sBreathAmt = 0;
01958                               if ( sWoundAmt > 0 )
01959                               {
01960                                if ( sWoundAmt == 1 )
01961                                {
01962                                     pSoldier->inv[ bPosOfMask ].bStatus[0] -= (INT8) Random( 2 );
01963                                }
01964                                else
01965                                {
01966                                     // use up gas mask
01967                                     pSoldier->inv[ bPosOfMask ].bStatus[0] -= (INT8) Random( 4 );
01968                                }
01969                               }
01970                               sWoundAmt = 0;                            
01971                          }
01972 
01973                    }
01974                   }
01975 
01976                   if ( sWoundAmt != 0 || sBreathAmt != 0 )
01977                   {
01978                         switch( pExplosive->ubType )
01979                         {
01980                               case EXPLOSV_CREATUREGAS:
01981                                     pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags |= HIT_BY_CREATUREGAS;
01982                                     break;
01983                               case EXPLOSV_TEARGAS:
01984                                     pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags |= HIT_BY_TEARGAS;
01985                                     break;
01986                               case EXPLOSV_MUSTGAS:
01987                                     pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags |= HIT_BY_MUSTARDGAS;
01988                                     break;
01989                               default:
01990                                     break;
01991                         }
01992                         // a gas effect, take damage directly...
01993                         SoldierTakeDamage( pSoldier, ANIM_STAND, sWoundAmt, sBreathAmt, TAKE_DAMAGE_GAS, NOBODY, NOWHERE, 0, TRUE );
01994                         if ( pSoldier->bLife >= CONSCIOUSNESS )
01995                         {
01996                               DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, (INT8)( BATTLE_SOUND_HIT1 + Random( 2 ) ) );
01997                         }
01998                   }
01999                   */
02000        }
02001 
02002        (*pfMercHit) = TRUE;   
02003  }
02004 
02005  return( fRecompileMovementCosts );
02006 
02007 }
02008 
02009 void GetRayStopInfo( UINT32 uiNewSpot, UINT8 ubDir, INT8 bLevel, BOOLEAN fSmokeEffect, INT32 uiCurRange, INT32 *piMaxRange, UINT8 *pubKeepGoing )
02010 {
02011    INT8         bStructHeight;
02012    UINT8                      ubMovementCost;
02013    INT8                             Blocking, BlockingTemp;
02014        BOOLEAN      fTravelCostObs = FALSE;
02015    UINT32       uiRangeReduce;
02016    INT16        sNewGridNo;
02017        STRUCTURE *      pBlockingStructure;
02018    BOOLEAN      fBlowWindowSouth = FALSE;
02019        BOOLEAN                fReduceRay = TRUE;
02020 
02021        ubMovementCost = gubWorldMovementCosts[ uiNewSpot ][ ubDir ][ bLevel ];
02022 
02023        if ( IS_TRAVELCOST_DOOR( ubMovementCost ) )
02024        {
02025              ubMovementCost = DoorTravelCost( NULL, uiNewSpot, ubMovementCost, FALSE, NULL );
02026              // If we have hit a wall, STOP HERE
02027              if (ubMovementCost >= TRAVELCOST_BLOCKED)
02028              {
02029                    fTravelCostObs  = TRUE;
02030              }
02031        }
02032        else
02033        {
02034              // If we have hit a wall, STOP HERE
02035              if ( ubMovementCost == TRAVELCOST_WALL )
02036              {
02037                         // We have an obstacle here..
02038                         fTravelCostObs = TRUE;
02039              }
02040        }
02041 
02042   
02043        Blocking = GetBlockingStructureInfo( (INT16)uiNewSpot, ubDir, 0, bLevel, &bStructHeight, &pBlockingStructure, TRUE );
02044 
02045        if ( pBlockingStructure )
02046        {
02047              if ( pBlockingStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_CAVEWALL )
02048              {
02049                         // block completely!
02050                         fTravelCostObs = TRUE;
02051              }
02052              else if ( pBlockingStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubDensity <= 15 )
02053              {
02054                   // not stopped
02055                   fTravelCostObs = FALSE;
02056                   fReduceRay = FALSE;
02057              }
02058        }
02059 
02060        // ATE: For smoke, don't let it go over roof....
02061        if ( fSmokeEffect )
02062        {
02063              if ( bLevel )
02064              {
02065                   STRUCTURE * pStructure;
02066 
02067                   // Check for roof here....
02068                   pStructure = FindStructure( (INT16)uiNewSpot, STRUCTURE_ROOF );
02069 
02070                   if ( pStructure == NULL )
02071                   {
02072                         // block completely!
02073                         fTravelCostObs = TRUE;
02074                   }
02075              }
02076        }
02077        if ( fTravelCostObs )
02078        {
02079 
02080              if ( fSmokeEffect )
02081              {
02082                    if ( Blocking == BLOCKING_TOPRIGHT_OPEN_WINDOW || Blocking == BLOCKING_TOPLEFT_OPEN_WINDOW )
02083                    {
02084                               // If open, fTravelCostObs set to false and reduce range....
02085                               fTravelCostObs = FALSE;
02086                               // Range will be reduced below...
02087                    }
02088 
02089                    if ( fTravelCostObs )
02090                    {
02091                          // ATE: For windows, check to the west and north for a broken window, as movement costs
02092                          // will override there...
02093                          sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (INT16)uiNewSpot, DirectionInc( WEST ) );
02094 
02095                          BlockingTemp = GetBlockingStructureInfo( (INT16)sNewGridNo, ubDir, 0, bLevel, &bStructHeight, &pBlockingStructure, TRUE );
02096                          if ( BlockingTemp == BLOCKING_TOPRIGHT_OPEN_WINDOW || BlockingTemp == BLOCKING_TOPLEFT_OPEN_WINDOW )
02097                          {
02098                                     // If open, fTravelCostObs set to false and reduce range....
02099                                     fTravelCostObs = FALSE;
02100                                     // Range will be reduced below...
02101                          }
02102                          if ( pBlockingStructure && pBlockingStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubDensity <= 15 )
02103                          {
02104                               fTravelCostObs = FALSE;
02105                               fReduceRay = FALSE;
02106                          }
02107                    }
02108 
02109                    if ( fTravelCostObs )
02110                    {
02111                          sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (INT16)uiNewSpot, DirectionInc( NORTH ) );
02112 
02113                          BlockingTemp = GetBlockingStructureInfo( (INT16)sNewGridNo, ubDir, 0, bLevel, &bStructHeight, &pBlockingStructure, TRUE );
02114                          if ( BlockingTemp == BLOCKING_TOPRIGHT_OPEN_WINDOW || BlockingTemp == BLOCKING_TOPLEFT_OPEN_WINDOW )
02115                          {
02116                                     // If open, fTravelCostObs set to false and reduce range....
02117                                     fTravelCostObs = FALSE;
02118                                     // Range will be reduced below...
02119                          }
02120                          if ( pBlockingStructure && pBlockingStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubDensity <= 15 )
02121                          {
02122                               fTravelCostObs = FALSE;
02123                               fReduceRay = FALSE;
02124                          }
02125                    }
02126 
02127              }
02128              else
02129              {
02130                    // We are a blast effect....
02131 
02132                    // ATE: explode windows!!!!
02133                    if ( Blocking == BLOCKING_TOPLEFT_WINDOW || Blocking == BLOCKING_TOPRIGHT_WINDOW )
02134                    {
02135                          // Explode!
02136                          if ( ubDir == SOUTH || ubDir == SOUTHEAST || ubDir == SOUTHWEST )
02137                          {
02138                                fBlowWindowSouth = TRUE;
02139                          }
02140 
02141                          if ( pBlockingStructure != NULL )
02142                          {
02143                         WindowHit( (INT16)uiNewSpot, pBlockingStructure->usStructureID, fBlowWindowSouth, TRUE );
02144                          }
02145                    }
02146 
02147                    // ATE: For windows, check to the west and north for a broken window, as movement costs
02148                    // will override there...
02149                    sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (INT16)uiNewSpot, DirectionInc( WEST ) );
02150 
02151                    BlockingTemp = GetBlockingStructureInfo( (INT16)sNewGridNo, ubDir, 0, bLevel, &bStructHeight, &pBlockingStructure , TRUE );
02152                    if ( pBlockingStructure && pBlockingStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubDensity <= 15 )
02153                    {
02154                         fTravelCostObs = FALSE;
02155                         fReduceRay = FALSE;
02156                    }
02157                    if ( BlockingTemp == BLOCKING_TOPRIGHT_WINDOW || BlockingTemp == BLOCKING_TOPLEFT_WINDOW )
02158                    {
02159                          if ( pBlockingStructure != NULL )
02160                          {
02161                         WindowHit( sNewGridNo, pBlockingStructure->usStructureID, FALSE, TRUE );
02162                          }
02163                    }
02164 
02165                    sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (INT16)uiNewSpot, DirectionInc( NORTH ) );
02166                    BlockingTemp = GetBlockingStructureInfo( (INT16)sNewGridNo, ubDir, 0, bLevel, &bStructHeight, &pBlockingStructure, TRUE );
02167 
02168                    if ( pBlockingStructure && pBlockingStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubDensity <= 15 )
02169                    {
02170                           fTravelCostObs = FALSE;
02171                           fReduceRay = FALSE;
02172                    }
02173                    if ( BlockingTemp == BLOCKING_TOPRIGHT_WINDOW || BlockingTemp == BLOCKING_TOPLEFT_WINDOW )
02174                    {
02175                          if ( pBlockingStructure != NULL )
02176                          {
02177                         WindowHit( sNewGridNo, pBlockingStructure->usStructureID, FALSE, TRUE );
02178                          }
02179                    }
02180              }
02181        }
02182 
02183    // Have we hit things like furniture, etc?
02184        if ( Blocking != NOTHING_BLOCKING && !fTravelCostObs )
02185        {
02186       // ATE: Tall things should blaock all
02187       if ( bStructHeight == 4 )
02188       {
02189                          (*pubKeepGoing) = FALSE;
02190       }
02191       else
02192       {
02193         // If we are smoke, reduce range variably....
02194                     if ( fReduceRay )
02195                     {
02196                           if ( fSmokeEffect )
02197                           {
02198                                 switch( bStructHeight )
02199                                 {
02200                                       case 3:
02201                                             uiRangeReduce = 2;
02202                                             break;
02203 
02204                                       case 2:
02205 
02206                                             uiRangeReduce = 1;
02207                                             break;
02208 
02209                                       default:
02210 
02211                                             uiRangeReduce = 0;
02212                                             break;
02213                                 }        
02214                           }
02215                           else
02216                           {
02217                                 uiRangeReduce = 2;
02218                           }
02219 
02220                     ( *piMaxRange ) -= uiRangeReduce;
02221                     }
02222 
02223                     if ( uiCurRange <= (*piMaxRange) )
02224                     {
02225                            (*pubKeepGoing) = TRUE;
02226                     }
02227                     else
02228                     {
02229                            (*pubKeepGoing) = FALSE;
02230                     }
02231       }
02232        }
02233        else
02234        {
02235       if ( fTravelCostObs )
02236       {
02237                     ( *pubKeepGoing ) = FALSE;
02238       }
02239       else
02240       {
02241                     ( *pubKeepGoing ) = TRUE;
02242       }
02243        }
02244 }
02245 
02246 
02247 
02248 void SpreadEffect( INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubRadius, UINT16 usItem, UINT8 ubOwner, BOOLEAN fSubsequent, INT8 bLevel, INT32 iSmokeEffectID  )
02249 {
02250  INT32 uiNewSpot, uiTempSpot, uiBranchSpot, cnt, branchCnt;
02251  INT32  uiTempRange, ubBranchRange;
02252  UINT8  ubDir,ubBranchDir, ubKeepGoing;
02253  INT16 sRange;
02254  BOOLEAN            fRecompileMovement = FALSE;
02255  BOOLEAN                fAnyMercHit = FALSE;
02256  BOOLEAN      fSmokeEffect = FALSE;
02257 
02258  switch( Explosive[Item[usItem].ubClassIndex].ubType  )
02259  {
02260 
02261       case EXPLOSV_MUSTGAS:
02262       case EXPLOSV_BURNABLEGAS:
02263       case EXPLOSV_TEARGAS:
02264       case EXPLOSV_SMOKE:
02265       case EXPLOSV_CREATUREGAS:
02266 
02267           fSmokeEffect = TRUE;
02268             break;
02269  }
02270  
02271       // Set values for recompile region to optimize area we need to recompile for MPs
02272       gsRecompileAreaTop = sGridNo / WORLD_COLS;
02273       gsRecompileAreaLeft = sGridNo % WORLD_COLS;
02274       gsRecompileAreaRight = gsRecompileAreaLeft;
02275       gsRecompileAreaBottom = gsRecompileAreaTop;
02276 
02277  // multiply range by 2 so we can correctly calculate approximately round explosion regions
02278  sRange = ubRadius * 2;
02279 
02280  // first, affect main spot
02281  if ( ExpAffect( sGridNo, sGridNo, 0, usItem, ubOwner, fSubsequent, &fAnyMercHit, bLevel, iSmokeEffectID ) )
02282  {
02283             fRecompileMovement = TRUE;
02284  }
02285 
02286  
02287  for (ubDir = NORTH; ubDir <= NORTHWEST; ubDir++ )
02288  {
02289    uiTempSpot = sGridNo;
02290 
02291    uiTempRange = sRange;
02292 
02293        if (ubDir & 1)
02294        {
02295             cnt = 3;
02296        }
02297        else
02298        {
02299             cnt = 2;
02300        }
02301        while( cnt <= uiTempRange) // end of range loop
02302    {
02303      // move one tile in direction
02304      uiNewSpot = NewGridNo( (INT16)uiTempSpot, DirectionInc( ubDir ) );
02305 
02306      // see if this was a different spot & if we should be able to reach
02307      // this spot
02308      if (uiNewSpot == uiTempSpot)
02309              {
02310                    ubKeepGoing = FALSE;
02311              }
02312      else
02313      {
02314                    // Check if struct is a tree, etc and reduce range...
02315        GetRayStopInfo( uiNewSpot, ubDir, bLevel, fSmokeEffect, cnt, &uiTempRange, &ubKeepGoing );
02316      }
02317 
02318      if (ubKeepGoing)
02319      {
02320        uiTempSpot = uiNewSpot;
02321 
02322                    //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Explosion affects %d", uiNewSpot) );
02323        // ok, do what we do here...
02324        if ( ExpAffect( sGridNo, (INT16)uiNewSpot, cnt / 2, usItem, ubOwner, fSubsequent, &fAnyMercHit, bLevel, iSmokeEffectID ) )
02325                    {
02326                               fRecompileMovement = TRUE;
02327                    }
02328 
02329        // how far should we branch out here?
02330        ubBranchRange = (UINT8)( sRange - cnt );
02331 
02332        if ( ubBranchRange )
02333                    {
02334                          // ok, there's a branch here. Mark where we start this branch.
02335                          uiBranchSpot = uiNewSpot;
02336 
02337                          // figure the branch direction - which is one dir clockwise
02338                          ubBranchDir = (ubDir + 1) % 8;
02339 
02340                          if (ubBranchDir & 1)
02341                          {
02342                               branchCnt = 3;
02343                          }
02344                          else
02345                          {
02346                               branchCnt = 2;
02347                          }
02348 
02349                          while( branchCnt <= ubBranchRange) // end of range loop
02350                          {
02351                                     ubKeepGoing        = TRUE;
02352                                 uiNewSpot = NewGridNo( (INT16)uiBranchSpot, DirectionInc(ubBranchDir));
02353 
02354                                     if (uiNewSpot != uiBranchSpot)
02355                                     {
02356                           // Check if struct is a tree, etc and reduce range...
02357               GetRayStopInfo( uiNewSpot, ubBranchDir, bLevel, fSmokeEffect, branchCnt, &ubBranchRange, &ubKeepGoing );
02358 
02359                                       if ( ubKeepGoing )
02360                                           {
02361                                                 // ok, do what we do here
02362                                                 //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Explosion affects %d", uiNewSpot) );
02363                                                 if ( ExpAffect( sGridNo, (INT16)uiNewSpot, (INT16)((cnt + branchCnt) / 2), usItem, ubOwner, fSubsequent, &fAnyMercHit, bLevel, iSmokeEffectID ) )
02364                                                 {
02365                                                       fRecompileMovement = TRUE;
02366                                                 }
02367                                                 uiBranchSpot = uiNewSpot;
02368                                           }
02369                                           //else
02370                                           {
02371                                                  // check if it's ANY door, and if so, affect that spot so it's damaged
02372               //   if (RealDoorAt(uiNewSpot))
02373                                           //     {
02374               //      ExpAffect(sGridNo,uiNewSpot,cnt,ubReason,fSubsequent);
02375                                           //     }
02376                                                  // blocked, break out of the the sub-branch loop
02377                                           //     break;
02378                                           }
02379                                     }
02380 
02381                                if (ubBranchDir & 1)
02382                                {
02383                                     branchCnt += 3;
02384                                }
02385                                else
02386                                {
02387                                     branchCnt += 2;
02388                                }
02389 
02390                         }
02391                   } // end of if a branch to do
02392 
02393      }
02394      else         // at edge, or tile blocks further spread in that direction
02395              {
02396        break;
02397              }
02398 
02399              if (ubDir & 1)
02400              {
02401                   cnt += 3;
02402              }
02403              else
02404              {
02405                   cnt += 2;
02406              }
02407        }
02408 
02409   }   // end of dir loop
02410 
02411       // Recompile movement costs...
02412       if ( fRecompileMovement )
02413       {
02414             INT16 sX, sY;
02415 
02416             // DO wireframes as well
02417             ConvertGridNoToXY( (INT16)sGridNo, &sX, &sY );
02418             SetRecalculateWireFrameFlagRadius( sX, sY, ubRadius );
02419             CalculateWorldWireFrameTiles( FALSE );
02420       
02421             RecompileLocalMovementCostsInAreaWithFlags();
02422             RecompileLocalMovementCostsFromRadius( sGridNo, MAX_DISTANCE_EXPLOSIVE_CAN_DESTROY_STRUCTURES );
02423 
02424             // if anything has been done to change movement costs and this is a potential POW situation, check
02425             // paths for POWs
02426             if ( gWorldSectorX == 13 && gWorldSectorY == MAP_ROW_I )
02427             {
02428                   DoPOWPathChecks();
02429             }
02430 
02431       }
02432 
02433       // do sight checks if something damaged or smoke stuff involved
02434       if ( fRecompileMovement || fSmokeEffect )
02435       {
02436             if ( gubElementsOnExplosionQueue )
02437             {
02438                   gfExplosionQueueMayHaveChangedSight = TRUE;
02439             }
02440       }
02441 
02442       gsRecompileAreaTop = 0;
02443       gsRecompileAreaLeft = 0;
02444       gsRecompileAreaRight = 0;
02445       gsRecompileAreaBottom = 0;
02446 
02447       if (fAnyMercHit)
02448       {
02449             // reset explosion hit flag so we can damage mercs again
02450             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < (INT32)guiNumMercSlots; cnt++ )
02451             {
02452                   if ( MercSlots[ cnt ] )
02453                   {
02454                         MercSlots[ cnt ]->ubMiscSoldierFlags &= ~SOLDIER_MISC_HURT_BY_EXPLOSION;
02455                   }
02456             }     
02457       }
02458 
02459       if ( fSubsequent != BLOOD_SPREAD_EFFECT )
02460       {
02461             MakeNoise( NOBODY, sGridNo, bLevel, gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].ubTerrainID, (UINT8)Explosive[ Item [ usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubVolume, NOISE_EXPLOSION );
02462 
02463       }
02464 }
02465 
02466 void ToggleActionItemsByFrequency( INT8 bFrequency )
02467 {
02468       UINT32                        uiWorldBombIndex;
02469       OBJECTTYPE *      pObj;
02470 
02471       // Go through all the bombs in the world, and look for remote ones
02472       for (uiWorldBombIndex = 0; uiWorldBombIndex < guiNumWorldBombs; uiWorldBombIndex++)
02473       {
02474             if (gWorldBombs[uiWorldBombIndex].fExists)
02475             {
02476                   pObj = &( gWorldItems[ gWorldBombs[uiWorldBombIndex].iItemIndex ].o );
02477                   if ( pObj->bDetonatorType == BOMB_REMOTE )
02478                   {
02479                         // Found a remote bomb, so check to see if it has the same frequency
02480                         if (pObj->bFrequency == bFrequency)
02481                         {
02482                               // toggle its active flag
02483                               if (pObj->fFlags & OBJECT_DISABLED_BOMB)
02484                               {
02485                                     pObj->fFlags &= (~OBJECT_DISABLED_BOMB);
02486                               }
02487                               else
02488                               {
02489                                     pObj->fFlags |= OBJECT_DISABLED_BOMB;
02490                               }
02491                         }
02492                   }
02493             }
02494       }
02495 }
02496 
02497 void TogglePressureActionItemsInGridNo( INT16 sGridNo )
02498 {
02499       UINT32                        uiWorldBombIndex;
02500       OBJECTTYPE *      pObj;
02501 
02502       // Go through all the bombs in the world, and look for remote ones
02503       for (uiWorldBombIndex = 0; uiWorldBombIndex < guiNumWorldBombs; uiWorldBombIndex++)
02504       {
02505             if ( gWorldBombs[uiWorldBombIndex].fExists && gWorldItems[ gWorldBombs[uiWorldBombIndex].iItemIndex ].sGridNo == sGridNo )
02506             {
02507                   pObj = &( gWorldItems[ gWorldBombs[uiWorldBombIndex].iItemIndex ].o );
02508                   if ( pObj->bDetonatorType == BOMB_PRESSURE )
02509                   {
02510                         // Found a pressure item
02511                         // toggle its active flag
02512                         if (pObj->fFlags & OBJECT_DISABLED_BOMB)
02513                         {
02514                               pObj->fFlags &= (~OBJECT_DISABLED_BOMB);
02515                         }
02516                         else
02517                         {
02518                               pObj->fFlags |= OBJECT_DISABLED_BOMB;
02519                         }
02520                   }
02521             }
02522       }
02523 }
02524 
02525 
02526 void DelayedBillyTriggerToBlockOnExit( void )
02527 {
02528       if ( WhoIsThere2( gsTempActionGridNo, 0 ) == NOBODY )
02529       {
02530             TriggerNPCRecord( BILLY, 6 );
02531       }
02532       else
02533       {
02534             // delay further!
02535             SetCustomizableTimerCallbackAndDelay( 1000, DelayedBillyTriggerToBlockOnExit, TRUE );
02536       }
02537 }
02538 
02539 void BillyBlocksDoorCallback( void )
02540 {
02541       TriggerNPCRecord( BILLY, 6 );
02542 }
02543 
02544 BOOLEAN HookerInRoom( UINT8 ubRoom )
02545 {
02546       UINT8                               ubLoop, ubTempRoom;
02547       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
02548 
02549       for ( ubLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bFirstID; ubLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bLastID; ubLoop++ )
02550       {
02551             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubLoop ];
02552 
02553             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pSoldier->bNeutral && pSoldier->ubBodyType == MINICIV )
02554             {
02555                   if ( InARoom( pSoldier->sGridNo, &ubTempRoom ) && ubTempRoom == ubRoom )
02556                   {
02557                         return( TRUE );
02558                   }
02559             }
02560       }
02561 
02562       return( FALSE );
02563 }
02564 
02565 void PerformItemAction( INT16 sGridNo, OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
02566 {
02567       STRUCTURE * pStructure;
02568 
02569       switch( pObj->bActionValue )
02570       {
02571             case ACTION_ITEM_OPEN_DOOR:
02572                   pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR );
02573                   if (pStructure)
02574                   {
02575                         if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN)
02576                         {
02577                               // it's already open - this MIGHT be an error but probably not
02578                               // because we are basically just ensuring that the door is open
02579                         }
02580                         else
02581                         {
02582                               if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_BASE_TILE)
02583                               {
02584                                     HandleDoorChangeFromGridNo( NULL, sGridNo, FALSE );
02585                               }
02586                               else
02587                               {
02588                                     HandleDoorChangeFromGridNo( NULL, pStructure->sBaseGridNo, FALSE );
02589                               }
02590                               gfExplosionQueueMayHaveChangedSight = TRUE;
02591                         }
02592                   }
02593                   else
02594                   {
02595                         // error message here
02596                         #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02597                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Action item to open door in gridno %d but there is none!", sGridNo );
02598                         #endif
02599                   }
02600                   break;
02601             case ACTION_ITEM_CLOSE_DOOR:
02602                   pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR );
02603                   if (pStructure)
02604                   {
02605                         if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN)
02606                         {
02607                               if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_BASE_TILE)
02608                               {
02609                                     HandleDoorChangeFromGridNo( NULL, sGridNo , FALSE );
02610                               }
02611                               else
02612                               {
02613                                     HandleDoorChangeFromGridNo( NULL, pStructure->sBaseGridNo, FALSE );
02614                               }
02615                               gfExplosionQueueMayHaveChangedSight = TRUE;
02616                         }
02617                         else
02618                         {
02619                               // it's already closed - this MIGHT be an error but probably not
02620                               // because we are basically just ensuring that the door is closed
02621                         }
02622                   }
02623                   else
02624                   {
02625                         // error message here
02626                         #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02627                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Action item to close door in gridno %d but there is none!", sGridNo );
02628                         #endif
02629                   }
02630                   break;
02631             case ACTION_ITEM_TOGGLE_DOOR:
02632                   pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR );
02633                   if (pStructure)
02634                   {
02635                         if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_BASE_TILE)
02636                         {
02637                               HandleDoorChangeFromGridNo( NULL, sGridNo, FALSE );
02638                         }
02639                         else
02640                         {
02641                               HandleDoorChangeFromGridNo( NULL, pStructure->sBaseGridNo , FALSE );
02642                         }
02643                         gfExplosionQueueMayHaveChangedSight = TRUE;
02644                   }
02645                   else
02646                   {
02647                         // error message here
02648                         #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02649                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Action item to toggle door in gridno %d but there is none!", sGridNo );
02650                         #endif
02651                   }
02652                   break;
02653             case ACTION_ITEM_UNLOCK_DOOR:
02654                   {
02655                         DOOR * pDoor;
02656                         
02657                         pDoor = FindDoorInfoAtGridNo( sGridNo );
02658                         if ( pDoor )
02659                         {
02660                               pDoor->fLocked = FALSE;
02661                         }
02662                   }
02663                   break;
02664             case ACTION_ITEM_TOGGLE_LOCK:
02665                   {
02666                         DOOR * pDoor;
02667                         
02668                         pDoor = FindDoorInfoAtGridNo( sGridNo );
02669                         if ( pDoor )
02670                         {
02671                               if ( pDoor->fLocked )
02672                               {
02673                                     pDoor->fLocked = FALSE;
02674                               }
02675                               else
02676                               {
02677                                     pDoor->fLocked = TRUE;
02678                               }
02679                         }
02680                   }
02681                   break;
02682             case ACTION_ITEM_UNTRAP_DOOR:
02683                   {
02684                         DOOR * pDoor;
02685                         
02686                         pDoor = FindDoorInfoAtGridNo( sGridNo );
02687                         if ( pDoor )
02688                         {
02689                               pDoor->ubTrapLevel = 0;
02690                               pDoor->ubTrapID = NO_TRAP;
02691                         }
02692                   }
02693                   break;
02694             case ACTION_ITEM_SMALL_PIT:
02695                   Add3X3Pit( sGridNo );
02696                   SearchForOtherMembersWithinPitRadiusAndMakeThemFall( sGridNo, 1 );
02697                   break;
02698             case ACTION_ITEM_LARGE_PIT:
02699                   Add5X5Pit( sGridNo );
02700                   SearchForOtherMembersWithinPitRadiusAndMakeThemFall( sGridNo, 2 );
02701                   break;
02702             case ACTION_ITEM_TOGGLE_ACTION1:
02703                   ToggleActionItemsByFrequency( FIRST_MAP_PLACED_FREQUENCY + 1 );
02704                   break;
02705             case ACTION_ITEM_TOGGLE_ACTION2:
02706                   ToggleActionItemsByFrequency( FIRST_MAP_PLACED_FREQUENCY + 2 );
02707                   break;
02708             case ACTION_ITEM_TOGGLE_ACTION3:
02709                   ToggleActionItemsByFrequency( FIRST_MAP_PLACED_FREQUENCY + 3 );
02710                   break;
02711             case ACTION_ITEM_TOGGLE_ACTION4:
02712                   ToggleActionItemsByFrequency( FIRST_MAP_PLACED_FREQUENCY + 4 );
02713                   break;
02714             case ACTION_ITEM_TOGGLE_PRESSURE_ITEMS:
02715                   TogglePressureActionItemsInGridNo( sGridNo );
02716                   break;
02717             case ACTION_ITEM_ENTER_BROTHEL:
02718                   // JA2Gold: Disable brothel tracking
02719 /*                
02720                   if ( ! (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
02721                   {
02722                         UINT8       ubID;
02723

02725                         if ( (ubID != NOBODY) && (MercPtrs[ ubID ]->bTeam == gbPlayerNum) )
02726                         {

02788

02791                   break;
02792             case ACTION_ITEM_EXIT_BROTHEL:

02800                         if ( (ubID != NOBODY) && (MercPtrs[ ubID ]->bTeam == gbPlayerNum) && MercPtrs[ ubID ]->sOldGridNo == sGridNo + DirectionInc( NORTH ) )
02801                         {
02802                               gMercProfiles[ MADAME ].bNPCData2--;
02803                               if ( gMercProfiles[ MADAME ].bNPCData2 == 0 )
02804                               {
02805                                     // reset paid #
02806                                     gMercProfiles[ MADAME ].bNPCData = 0;
02807                               }
02808                               // Billy should move back to block the door again

02810                               SetCustomizableTimerCallbackAndDelay( 1000, DelayedBillyTriggerToBlockOnExit, TRUE );
02811                         }
02812                   }
02813 */                
02814                   break;
02815             case ACTION_ITEM_KINGPIN_ALARM:
02816                   PlayJA2Sample( KLAXON_ALARM, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( MIDVOLUME, sGridNo ), 5, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );
02817                   CallAvailableKingpinMenTo( sGridNo );
02818 
02819                   gTacticalStatus.fCivGroupHostile[ KINGPIN_CIV_GROUP ] = CIV_GROUP_HOSTILE;
02820 
02821                   {
02822                         UINT8       ubID, ubID2;
02823                         BOOLEAN     fEnterCombat = FALSE;
02824 
02825                         for ( ubID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bFirstID; ubID <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bLastID; ubID++ )
02826                         {

02828                               {
