02830                                     {
02831                                           if ( MercPtrs[ ubID ]->bOppList[ ubID2 ] == SEEN_CURRENTLY )
02832                                           {
02833                                                 MakeCivHostile( MercPtrs[ ubID ], 2 );
02834                                                 fEnterCombat = TRUE;
02835                                           }
02836                                     }
02837                               }
02838                         }
02839 
02840                         if ( ! (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
02841                         {
02842                               EnterCombatMode( CIV_TEAM );
02843                         }
02844                   }
02845 
02846                   // now zap this object so it won't activate again
02847                   pObj->fFlags &= (~OBJECT_DISABLED_BOMB);
02848                   break;
02849             case ACTION_ITEM_SEX:
02850                   // JA2Gold: Disable brothel sex Madd: Re-enabled
02851                   
02852                   if ( ! (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
02853                   {
02854                         UINT8       ubID;
02855                         OBJECTTYPE DoorCloser;
02856                         INT16       sTeleportSpot;
02857                         INT16       sDoorSpot;
02858                         UINT8       ubDirection;
02859                         UINT8       ubRoom, ubOldRoom;
02860 
02861                         ubID = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, 0 );
02862                         if ( (ubID != NOBODY) && (MercPtrs[ ubID ]->bTeam == gbPlayerNum) )
02863                         {
02864                               if ( InARoom( sGridNo, &ubRoom ) && InARoom( MercPtrs[ ubID ]->sOldGridNo, &ubOldRoom ) && ubOldRoom != ubRoom )
02865                               {
02866                                     // also require there to be a miniskirt civ in the room
02867                                     if ( HookerInRoom( ubRoom ) )
02868                                     {
02869 
02870                                           // stop the merc...
02871                                           EVENT_StopMerc( MercPtrs[ ubID ], MercPtrs[ ubID ]->sGridNo, MercPtrs[ ubID ]->bDirection );
02872 
02873                                           switch( sGridNo )
02874                                           {
02875                                                 case 13414:
02876                                                       sDoorSpot = 13413;
02877                                                       sTeleportSpot = 13413;
02878                                                       break;
02879                                                 case 11174:
02880                                                       sDoorSpot = 11173;
02881                                                       sTeleportSpot = 11173;
02882                                                       break;
02883                                                 case 12290:
02884                                                       sDoorSpot = 12290;
02885                                                       sTeleportSpot = 12291;
02886                                                       break;
02887 
02888                                                 default:
02889 
02890                                                       sDoorSpot = NOWHERE;
02891                                                       sTeleportSpot = NOWHERE;
02892 
02893 
02894                                           }
02895 
02896                                           if ( sDoorSpot != NOWHERE && sTeleportSpot != NOWHERE )
02897                                           {
02898                                                 // close the door... 
02899                                                 DoorCloser.bActionValue = ACTION_ITEM_CLOSE_DOOR;
02900                                                 PerformItemAction( sDoorSpot, &DoorCloser );
02901 
02902                                                 // have sex
02903                                                 HandleNPCDoAction( 0, NPC_ACTION_SEX, 0 );      
02904                                                 
02905                                                 // move the merc outside of the room again
02906                                                 sTeleportSpot = FindGridNoFromSweetSpotWithStructData( MercPtrs[ ubID ], STANDING, sTeleportSpot, 2, &ubDirection, FALSE );
02907                                                 ChangeSoldierState( MercPtrs[ ubID ], STANDING, 0, TRUE );
02908                                                 TeleportSoldier( MercPtrs[ ubID ], sTeleportSpot, FALSE );
02909 
02910                                                 HandleMoraleEvent( MercPtrs[ ubID ], MORALE_SEX, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
02911                                                 FatigueCharacter( MercPtrs[ ubID ] );
02912                                                 FatigueCharacter( MercPtrs[ ubID ] );
02913                                                 FatigueCharacter( MercPtrs[ ubID ] );
02914                                                 FatigueCharacter( MercPtrs[ ubID ] );
02915                                                 DirtyMercPanelInterface( MercPtrs[ ubID ], DIRTYLEVEL1 ); 
02916                                           }
02917                                     }
02918 
02919                               }
02920                               break;
02921 
02922                         }
02923                   }
02924                   
02925                   break;
02926             case ACTION_ITEM_REVEAL_ROOM:
02927                   {
02928                         UINT8 ubRoom;
02929                         if ( InAHiddenRoom( sGridNo, &ubRoom ) )
02930                         {
02931                               RemoveRoomRoof( sGridNo, ubRoom, NULL );
02932                         }
02933                   }
02934                   break;
02935             case ACTION_ITEM_LOCAL_ALARM:             
02936                   MakeNoise( NOBODY, sGridNo, 0, gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].ubTerrainID, 30, NOISE_SILENT_ALARM );
02937                   break;
02938             case ACTION_ITEM_GLOBAL_ALARM:
02939                   CallAvailableEnemiesTo( sGridNo );
02940                   break;
02941             case ACTION_ITEM_BLOODCAT_ALARM:
02942                   CallAvailableTeamEnemiesTo( sGridNo, CREATURE_TEAM );
02943                   break;
02944             case ACTION_ITEM_KLAXON:
02945                   PlayJA2Sample( KLAXON_ALARM, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( MIDVOLUME, sGridNo ), 5, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );
02946                   break;
02947             case ACTION_ITEM_MUSEUM_ALARM:
02948                   PlayJA2Sample( KLAXON_ALARM, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( MIDVOLUME, sGridNo ), 5, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );
02949                   CallEldinTo( sGridNo );
02950                   break;
02951             default:
02952                   // error message here
02953                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02954                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Action item with invalid action in gridno %d!", sGridNo );
02955                   #endif
02956                   break;
02957       }
02958 }
02959 
02960 void AddBombToQueue( UINT32 uiWorldBombIndex, UINT32 uiTimeStamp )
02961 {
02962       if (gubElementsOnExplosionQueue == MAX_BOMB_QUEUE)
02963       {
02964             return;
02965       }
02966       
02967       gExplosionQueue[gubElementsOnExplosionQueue].uiWorldBombIndex = uiWorldBombIndex;
02968       gExplosionQueue[gubElementsOnExplosionQueue].uiTimeStamp = uiTimeStamp;
02969       gExplosionQueue[gubElementsOnExplosionQueue].fExists = TRUE;
02970       if (!gfExplosionQueueActive)
02971       {
02972             // lock UI
02973             guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_BEGINUILOCK;
02974             // disable sight
02975             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= DISALLOW_SIGHT;
02976       }
02977       gubElementsOnExplosionQueue++;
02978       gfExplosionQueueActive = TRUE;
02979 }
02980 
02981 void HandleExplosionQueue( void )
02982 {
02983       UINT32                        uiIndex;
02984       UINT32                        uiWorldBombIndex;
02985       UINT32                        uiCurrentTime;
02986       INT16                         sGridNo;
02987       OBJECTTYPE *      pObj;
02988   UINT8         ubLevel;
02989 
02990       if ( !gfExplosionQueueActive )
02991       {
02992             return;
02993       }
02994 
02995       uiCurrentTime = GetJA2Clock();
02996       for ( uiIndex = 0; uiIndex < gubElementsOnExplosionQueue; uiIndex++ )
02997       {
02998             if ( gExplosionQueue[ uiIndex ].fExists && uiCurrentTime >= gExplosionQueue[ uiIndex ].uiTimeStamp )
02999             {
03000                   // Set off this bomb now!
03001       
03002                   // Preliminary assignments:
03003                   uiWorldBombIndex = gExplosionQueue[ uiIndex ].uiWorldBombIndex;
03004                   pObj = &( gWorldItems[ gWorldBombs[ uiWorldBombIndex ].iItemIndex ].o );
03005                   sGridNo = gWorldItems[ gWorldBombs[ uiWorldBombIndex ].iItemIndex ].sGridNo;
03006                   ubLevel = gWorldItems[ gWorldBombs[ uiWorldBombIndex ].iItemIndex ].ubLevel;
03007 
03008                   if (pObj->usItem == ACTION_ITEM && pObj->bActionValue != ACTION_ITEM_BLOW_UP)
03009                   {
03010                         PerformItemAction( sGridNo, pObj );
03011                   }
03012                   else if ( pObj->usBombItem == TRIP_KLAXON )
03013                   {
03014                         PlayJA2Sample( KLAXON_ALARM, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( MIDVOLUME, sGridNo ), 5, SoundDir( sGridNo ) );
03015                         CallAvailableEnemiesTo( sGridNo );
03016                         //RemoveItemFromPool( sGridNo, gWorldBombs[ uiWorldBombIndex ].iItemIndex, 0 );
03017                   }
03018                   else if ( pObj->usBombItem == TRIP_FLARE )
03019                   {
03020                         NewLightEffect( sGridNo, (UINT8)Explosive[pObj->usItem].ubDuration, (UINT8)Explosive[pObj->usItem].ubStartRadius );
03021                         RemoveItemFromPool( sGridNo, gWorldBombs[ uiWorldBombIndex ].iItemIndex, ubLevel );
03022                   }
03023                   else
03024                   {
03025                         gfExplosionQueueMayHaveChangedSight = TRUE;
03026 
03027                         // We have to remove the item first to prevent the explosion from detonating it
03028                         // a second time :-)
03029                         RemoveItemFromPool( sGridNo, gWorldBombs[ uiWorldBombIndex ].iItemIndex, ubLevel );
03030 
03031                         // make sure no one thinks there is a bomb here any more!
03032                         if ( gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_PLAYER_MINE_PRESENT )
03033                         {
03034                               RemoveBlueFlag( sGridNo, ubLevel );
03035                         }
03036                         gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].uiFlags &= ~(MAPELEMENT_ENEMY_MINE_PRESENT);
03037 
03038                         // BOOM!
03039 
03040                         // bomb objects only store the SIDE who placed the bomb! :-(
03041                         if ( pObj->ubBombOwner > 1 )
03042                         {
03043                               IgniteExplosion( (UINT8) (pObj->ubBombOwner - 2), CenterX( sGridNo ), CenterY( sGridNo ), 0, sGridNo, pObj->usBombItem, ubLevel );
03044                         }
03045                         else
03046                         {
03047                               // pre-placed
03048                               IgniteExplosion( NOBODY, CenterX( sGridNo ), CenterY( sGridNo ), 0, sGridNo, pObj->usBombItem, ubLevel );
03049                         }
03050                   }
03051 
03052                   // Bye bye bomb
03053                   gExplosionQueue[ uiIndex ].fExists = FALSE;
03054             }
03055       }
03056 
03057       // See if we can reduce the # of elements on the queue that we have recorded
03058       // Easier to do it at this time rather than in the loop above
03059       while ( gubElementsOnExplosionQueue > 0 && gExplosionQueue[ gubElementsOnExplosionQueue - 1 ].fExists == FALSE )
03060       {
03061             gubElementsOnExplosionQueue--;
03062       }
03063 
03064       if ( gubElementsOnExplosionQueue == 0 && (gubPersonToSetOffExplosions == NOBODY || gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount == 0) )
03065       {
03066             // turn off explosion queue 
03067 
03068             // re-enable sight
03069             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= (~DISALLOW_SIGHT);
03070 
03071             if ( gubPersonToSetOffExplosions != NOBODY && !(MercPtrs[ gubPersonToSetOffExplosions ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC) )
03072             {
03073                   FreeUpNPCFromPendingAction( MercPtrs[ gubPersonToSetOffExplosions ] );
03074             }
03075 
03076             if (gfExplosionQueueMayHaveChangedSight)
03077             {
03078                   UINT8 ubLoop;
03079                   SOLDIERTYPE * pTeamSoldier;
03080 
03081                   // set variable so we may at least have someone to resolve interrupts vs
03082                   gubInterruptProvoker = gubPersonToSetOffExplosions;
03083                   AllTeamsLookForAll( TRUE );
03084 
03085                   // call fov code
03086                   ubLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
03087                   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubLoop ]; ubLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; ubLoop++, pTeamSoldier++ )
03088                   {
03089                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector )
03090                         {
03091                               RevealRoofsAndItems( pTeamSoldier, TRUE, FALSE, pTeamSoldier->bLevel, FALSE );
03092                         }
03093                   }
03094 
03095                   gfExplosionQueueMayHaveChangedSight = FALSE;
03096                   gubPersonToSetOffExplosions = NOBODY;
03097             }
03098 
03099             // unlock UI
03100             //UnSetUIBusy( (UINT8)gusSelectedSoldier );
03101             if ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) || gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam == gbPlayerNum )
03102             {
03103                   // don't end UI lock when it's a computer turn
03104                   guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_ENDUILOCK;
03105             }
03106 
03107             gfExplosionQueueActive = FALSE;
03108       }
03109 
03110 }
03111 
03112 void DecayBombTimers( void )
03113 {
03114       UINT32                        uiWorldBombIndex;
03115       UINT32                        uiTimeStamp;
03116       OBJECTTYPE *      pObj;
03117 
03118       uiTimeStamp = GetJA2Clock();
03119 
03120       // Go through all the bombs in the world, and look for timed ones
03121       for (uiWorldBombIndex = 0; uiWorldBombIndex < guiNumWorldBombs; uiWorldBombIndex++)
03122       {
03123             if (gWorldBombs[uiWorldBombIndex].fExists)
03124             {
03125                   pObj = &( gWorldItems[ gWorldBombs[uiWorldBombIndex].iItemIndex ].o );
03126                   if ( pObj->bDetonatorType == BOMB_TIMED && !(pObj->fFlags & OBJECT_DISABLED_BOMB) )
03127                   {
03128                         // Found a timed bomb, so decay its delay value and see if it goes off
03129                         pObj->bDelay--;
03130                         if (pObj->bDelay == 0)
03131                         {
03132                               // put this bomb on the queue
03133                               AddBombToQueue( uiWorldBombIndex, uiTimeStamp );
03134           // ATE: CC black magic....
03135                       if ( pObj->ubBombOwner > 1 )
03136           {
03137             gubPersonToSetOffExplosions = (UINT8) (pObj->ubBombOwner - 2);
03138           }
03139           else
03140           {
03141             gubPersonToSetOffExplosions = NOBODY;
03142           }
03143 
03144                               if (pObj->usItem != ACTION_ITEM || pObj->bActionValue == ACTION_ITEM_BLOW_UP)
03145                               {
03146                                     uiTimeStamp += BOMB_QUEUE_DELAY;
03147                               }
03148                         }
03149                   }
03150             }
03151       }
03152 }
03153 
03154 void SetOffBombsByFrequency( UINT8 ubID, INT8 bFrequency )
03155 {
03156       UINT32                        uiWorldBombIndex;
03157       UINT32                        uiTimeStamp;
03158       OBJECTTYPE *      pObj;
03159 
03160       uiTimeStamp = GetJA2Clock();
03161 
03162       // Go through all the bombs in the world, and look for remote ones
03163       for (uiWorldBombIndex = 0; uiWorldBombIndex < guiNumWorldBombs; uiWorldBombIndex++)
03164       {
03165             if (gWorldBombs[uiWorldBombIndex].fExists)
03166             {
03167                   pObj = &( gWorldItems[ gWorldBombs[uiWorldBombIndex].iItemIndex ].o );
03168                   if ( pObj->bDetonatorType == BOMB_REMOTE && !(pObj->fFlags & OBJECT_DISABLED_BOMB) )
03169                   {
03170                         // Found a remote bomb, so check to see if it has the same frequency
03171                         if (pObj->bFrequency == bFrequency)
03172                         {
03173 
03174                               gubPersonToSetOffExplosions = ubID;
03175 
03176                               // put this bomb on the queue
03177                               AddBombToQueue( uiWorldBombIndex, uiTimeStamp );
03178                               if (pObj->usItem != ACTION_ITEM || pObj->bActionValue == ACTION_ITEM_BLOW_UP)
03179                               {
03180                                     uiTimeStamp += BOMB_QUEUE_DELAY;
03181                               }
03182                         }
03183                   }
03184             }
03185       }
03186 }
03187 
03188 void SetOffPanicBombs( UINT8 ubID, INT8 bPanicTrigger )
03189 {
03190       // need to turn off gridnos & flags in gTacticalStatus
03191       gTacticalStatus.sPanicTriggerGridNo[ bPanicTrigger ] = NOWHERE;
03192       if ( (gTacticalStatus.sPanicTriggerGridNo[0] == NOWHERE) && 
03193                         (gTacticalStatus.sPanicTriggerGridNo[1] == NOWHERE) && 
03194                         (gTacticalStatus.sPanicTriggerGridNo[2] == NOWHERE) )
03195       {
03196             gTacticalStatus.fPanicFlags &= ~(PANIC_TRIGGERS_HERE);
03197       }
03198 
03199       switch( bPanicTrigger )
03200       {
03201             case 0:                                                                       
03202                   SetOffBombsByFrequency( ubID, PANIC_FREQUENCY );
03203                   gTacticalStatus.fPanicFlags &= ~(PANIC_BOMBS_HERE);
03204                   break;
03205 
03206             case 1:
03207                   SetOffBombsByFrequency( ubID, PANIC_FREQUENCY_2 );
03208                   break;
03209 
03210             case 2:
03211                   SetOffBombsByFrequency( ubID, PANIC_FREQUENCY_3 );
03212                   break;
03213 
03214             default:
03215                   break;
03216 
03217       }
03218 
03219       if ( gTacticalStatus.fPanicFlags )
03220       {
03221             // find a new "closest one"
03222             MakeClosestEnemyChosenOne();
03223       }
03224 }
03225 
03226 BOOLEAN SetOffBombsInGridNo( UINT8 ubID, INT16 sGridNo, BOOLEAN fAllBombs, INT8 bLevel )
03227 {
03228       UINT32                        uiWorldBombIndex;
03229       UINT32                        uiTimeStamp;
03230       OBJECTTYPE *      pObj;
03231       BOOLEAN                       fFoundMine = FALSE;
03232 
03233       uiTimeStamp = GetJA2Clock();
03234 
03235       // Go through all the bombs in the world, and look for mines at this location
03236       for (uiWorldBombIndex = 0; uiWorldBombIndex < guiNumWorldBombs; uiWorldBombIndex++)
03237       {
03238             if (gWorldBombs[uiWorldBombIndex].fExists && gWorldItems[ gWorldBombs[uiWorldBombIndex].iItemIndex ].sGridNo == sGridNo && gWorldItems[ gWorldBombs[uiWorldBombIndex].iItemIndex ].ubLevel == bLevel )
03239             {
03240                   pObj = &( gWorldItems[ gWorldBombs[uiWorldBombIndex].iItemIndex ].o );
03241                   if (!(pObj->fFlags & OBJECT_DISABLED_BOMB))
03242                   {
03243                         if (fAllBombs || pObj->bDetonatorType == BOMB_PRESSURE)
03244                         {
03245                               // Snap: if we do set off our own trap (e.g. by trying to disarm it), we pay!
03246                               /*if (!fAllBombs && MercPtrs[ ubID ]->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
03247                               {
03248                                     // ignore this unless it is a mine, etc which would have to have been placed by the
03249                                     // player, seeing as how the others are all marked as known to the AI.
03250                                     if ( !(Item[pObj->usItem].mine || pObj->usItem == TRIP_FLARE || pObj->usItem == TRIP_KLAXON ) )
03251                                     {
03252                                           continue;
03253                                     }
03254                               }
03255 
03256                               // player and militia ignore bombs set by player
03257                               if ( pObj->ubBombOwner > 1 && (MercPtrs[ ubID ]->bTeam == gbPlayerNum || MercPtrs[ ubID ]->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM) )
03258                               {
03259                                     continue;
03260                               
03261                               }*/
03262 
03263                               if (pObj->usItem == SWITCH)
03264                               {
03265                                     // send out a signal to detonate other bombs, rather than this which
03266                                     // isn't a bomb but a trigger
03267                                     SetOffBombsByFrequency( ubID, pObj->bFrequency );
03268                               }
03269                               else
03270                               {
03271                                     gubPersonToSetOffExplosions = ubID;
03272 
03273                                     // put this bomb on the queue
03274                                     AddBombToQueue( uiWorldBombIndex, uiTimeStamp );
03275                                     if (pObj->usItem != ACTION_ITEM || pObj->bActionValue == ACTION_ITEM_BLOW_UP)
03276                                     {
03277                                           uiTimeStamp += BOMB_QUEUE_DELAY;
03278                                     }
03279 
03280                                     if ( pObj->usBombItem != NOTHING && Item[ pObj->usBombItem ].usItemClass & IC_EXPLOSV )
03281                                     {
03282                                           fFoundMine = TRUE;
03283                                     }
03284 
03285                               }
03286                         }
03287                   }
03288             }
03289       }
03290       return( fFoundMine );
03291 }
03292 
03293 void ActivateSwitchInGridNo( UINT8 ubID, INT16 sGridNo )
03294 {
03295       UINT32                        uiWorldBombIndex;
03296       OBJECTTYPE *      pObj;
03297 
03298       // Go through all the bombs in the world, and look for mines at this location
03299       for (uiWorldBombIndex = 0; uiWorldBombIndex < guiNumWorldBombs; uiWorldBombIndex++)
03300       {
03301             if (gWorldBombs[uiWorldBombIndex].fExists && gWorldItems[ gWorldBombs[uiWorldBombIndex].iItemIndex ].sGridNo == sGridNo)
03302             {
03303                   pObj = &( gWorldItems[ gWorldBombs[uiWorldBombIndex].iItemIndex ].o );
03304 
03305                   if ( pObj->usItem == SWITCH && ( !(pObj->fFlags & OBJECT_DISABLED_BOMB) ) && pObj->bDetonatorType == BOMB_SWITCH)
03306                   {
03307                         // send out a signal to detonate other bombs, rather than this which
03308                         // isn't a bomb but a trigger
03309 
03310                         // first set attack busy count to 0 in case of a lingering a.b.c. problem...
03311                         gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount = 0;
03312 
03313                         SetOffBombsByFrequency( ubID, pObj->bFrequency );
03314                   }
03315             }
03316       }
03317 }
03318 
03319 BOOLEAN SaveExplosionTableToSaveGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
03320 {
03321       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten;
03322       UINT32      uiExplosionCount=0;
03323       UINT32      uiCnt;
03324 
03325 
03326       //
03327       //    Explosion queue Info
03328       //
03329 
03330 
03331       //Write the number of explosion queues
03332       FileWrite( hFile, &gubElementsOnExplosionQueue, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03333       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
03334       {
03335             FileClose( hFile );
03336             return( FALSE );
03337       }
03338 
03339 
03340       //loop through and add all the explosions
03341       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt< MAX_BOMB_QUEUE; uiCnt++)
03342       {
03343             FileWrite( hFile, &gExplosionQueue[ uiCnt ], sizeof( ExplosionQueueElement ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03344             if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( ExplosionQueueElement ) )
03345             {
03346                   FileClose( hFile );
03347                   return( FALSE );
03348             }
03349       }
03350 
03351 
03352       //
03353       //    Explosion Data
03354       //
03355 
03356       //loop through and count all the active explosions
03357       uiExplosionCount = 0;
03358       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt< NUM_EXPLOSION_SLOTS; uiCnt++)
03359       {
03360             if( gExplosionData[ uiCnt ].fAllocated )
03361             {
03362                   uiExplosionCount++;
03363             }
03364       }
03365 
03366       //Save the number of explosions
03367       FileWrite( hFile, &uiExplosionCount, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03368       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
03369       {
03370             FileClose( hFile );
03371             return( FALSE );
03372       }
03373 
03374 
03375 
03376       //loop through and count all the active explosions
03377       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt< NUM_EXPLOSION_SLOTS; uiCnt++)
03378       {
03379             if( gExplosionData[ uiCnt ].fAllocated )
03380             {                 
03381                   FileWrite( hFile, &gExplosionData[ uiCnt ], sizeof( EXPLOSIONTYPE ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03382                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( EXPLOSIONTYPE ) )
03383                   {
03384                         FileClose( hFile );
03385                         return( FALSE );
03386                   }
03387             }
03388       }
03389 
03390 
03391 
03392 
03393       return( TRUE );
03394 }
03395 
03396 
03397 
03398 BOOLEAN LoadExplosionTableFromSavedGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
03399 {
03400       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
03401       UINT32      uiExplosionCount=0;
03402       UINT32      uiCnt;
03403 
03404 
03405       //
03406       //    Explosion Queue
03407       //
03408 
03409       //Clear the Explosion queue
03410       memset( gExplosionQueue, 0, sizeof( ExplosionQueueElement ) * MAX_BOMB_QUEUE );
03411 
03412       //Read the number of explosions queue's
03413       FileRead( hFile, &gubElementsOnExplosionQueue, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
03414       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
03415       {
03416             return( FALSE );
03417       }
03418 
03419 
03420       //loop through read all the active explosions fro the file
03421       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt<MAX_BOMB_QUEUE; uiCnt++)
03422       {
03423             FileRead( hFile, &gExplosionQueue[ uiCnt ], sizeof( ExplosionQueueElement ), &uiNumBytesRead );
03424             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( ExplosionQueueElement ) )
03425             {
03426                   return( FALSE );
03427             }
03428       }
03429 
03430 
03431 
03432       //
03433       //    Explosion Data
03434       //
03435       
03436       //Load the number of explosions
03437       FileRead( hFile, &guiNumExplosions, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
03438       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
03439       {
03440             return( FALSE );
03441       }
03442 
03443 
03444       //loop through and load all the active explosions
03445       for( uiCnt=0; uiCnt< guiNumExplosions; uiCnt++)
03446       {
03447             FileRead( hFile, &gExplosionData[ uiCnt ], sizeof( EXPLOSIONTYPE ), &uiNumBytesRead );
03448             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( EXPLOSIONTYPE ) )
03449             {
03450                   return( FALSE );
03451             }
03452             gExplosionData[ uiCnt ].iID = uiCnt;
03453             gExplosionData[ uiCnt ].iLightID = -1;
03454 
03455             GenerateExplosionFromExplosionPointer( &gExplosionData[ uiCnt ] );
03456       }
03457 
03458       return( TRUE );
03459 }
03460 
03461 
03462 
03463 
03464 BOOLEAN DoesSAMExistHere( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT16 sSectorZ, INT16 sGridNo )
03465 {
03466       INT32 cnt;
03467       INT16 sSectorNo;
03468 
03469       // ATE: If we are belwo, return right away...
03470       if ( sSectorZ != 0 )
03471       {
03472             return( FALSE );
03473       }
03474 
03475       sSectorNo = SECTOR( sSectorX, sSectorY );
03476 
03477       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUMBER_OF_SAMS; cnt++ )
03478       {
03479             // Are we i nthe same sector...
03480             if ( pSamList[ cnt ] == sSectorNo )
03481             {
03482                   // Are we in the same gridno?
03483                   if ( pSamGridNoAList[ cnt ] == sGridNo || pSamGridNoBList[ cnt ] == sGridNo )
03484                   {
03485                         return( TRUE );
03486                   }
03487             }
03488       }
03489 
03490       return( FALSE );
03491 }
03492 
03493 
03494 void UpdateAndDamageSAMIfFound( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT16 sSectorZ, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubDamage )
03495 {
03496       INT16 sSectorNo;
03497 
03498       // OK, First check if SAM exists, and if not, return
03499       if ( !DoesSAMExistHere( sSectorX, sSectorY, sSectorZ, sGridNo ) )
03500       {
03501             return;
03502       }
03503 
03504       // Damage.....
03505       sSectorNo = CALCULATE_STRATEGIC_INDEX( sSectorX, sSectorY );
03506 
03507       if ( StrategicMap[ sSectorNo ].bSAMCondition >= ubDamage )
03508       {
03509             StrategicMap[ sSectorNo ].bSAMCondition -= ubDamage;
03510       }
03511       else
03512       {
03513             StrategicMap[ sSectorNo ].bSAMCondition = 0;
03514       }
03515 
03516       // SAM site may have been put out of commission...
03517       UpdateAirspaceControl( );
03518 
03519       // ATE: GRAPHICS UPDATE WILL GET DONE VIA NORMAL EXPLOSION CODE.....
03520 }
03521 
03522 
03523 void UpdateSAMDoneRepair( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT16 sSectorZ  )
03524 {
03525       INT32 cnt;
03526       INT16 sSectorNo;
03527       BOOLEAN           fInSector = FALSE;
03528       UINT16            usGoodGraphic, usDamagedGraphic;
03529 
03530       // ATE: If we are below, return right away...
03531       if ( sSectorZ != 0 )
03532       {
03533             return;
03534       }
03535 
03536       if ( sSectorX == gWorldSectorX && sSectorY == gWorldSectorY && sSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ )
03537       {
03538             fInSector = TRUE;
03539       }
03540 
03541 
03542       sSectorNo = SECTOR( sSectorX, sSectorY );
03543 
03544       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUMBER_OF_SAMS; cnt++ )
03545       {
03546             // Are we i nthe same sector...
03547             if ( pSamList[ cnt ] == sSectorNo )
03548             {
03549                   // get graphic.......
03550                   GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( EIGHTISTRUCT, (UINT16)( gbSAMGraphicList[ cnt ] ), &usGoodGraphic );                            
03551 
03552                   // Damaged one ( current ) is 2 less...
03553                   usDamagedGraphic = usGoodGraphic - 2;
03554 
03555                   // First gridno listed is base gridno....
03556 
03557                   // if this is loaded....
03558                   if ( fInSector )
03559                   {
03560                         // Update graphic.....
03561                         // Remove old!
03562                         ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( TRUE );
03563 
03564                         RemoveStruct( pSamGridNoAList[ cnt ], usDamagedGraphic );
03565                         AddStructToHead( pSamGridNoAList[ cnt ], usGoodGraphic );
03566 
03567                         ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( FALSE );
03568                   }
03569                   else
03570                   {
03571                         // We add temp changes to map not loaded....
03572                         // Remove old
03573                         RemoveStructFromUnLoadedMapTempFile( pSamGridNoAList[ cnt ], usDamagedGraphic, sSectorX, sSectorY, (UINT8)sSectorZ );
03574                         // Add new
03575                         AddStructToUnLoadedMapTempFile( pSamGridNoAList[ cnt ], usGoodGraphic, sSectorX, sSectorY, (UINT8)sSectorZ );
03576                   }
03577             }
03578       }
03579 
03580       // SAM site may have been put back into working order...
03581       UpdateAirspaceControl( );
03582 }
03583 
03584 
03585 // loop through civ team and find
03586 // anybody who is an NPC and
03587 // see if they get angry
03588 void HandleBuldingDestruction( INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubOwner )
03589 {
03590       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
03591       UINT8                               cnt;
03592 
03593   if ( ubOwner == NOBODY )
03594   {
03595     return;
03596   }
03597 
03598   if ( MercPtrs[ ubOwner ]->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
03599   {
03600     return;
03601   }
03602 
03603       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bFirstID;
03604   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++ ,pSoldier++ )
03605       {
03606             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife && pSoldier->bNeutral )
03607             {
03608       if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
03609       {
03610                         // ignore if the player is fighting the enemy here and this is a good guy
03611                         if ( gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bMenInSector > 0 && (gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags3 & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG3_GOODGUY) )
03612                         {
03613                               continue;
03614                         }
03615 
03616         if ( DoesNPCOwnBuilding( pSoldier, sGridNo ) )
03617         {
03618                               MakeNPCGrumpyForMinorOffense( pSoldier, MercPtrs[ ubOwner ] );
03619         }
03620       }
03621             }
03622       }
03623 }
03624 
03625 INT32 FindActiveTimedBomb( void )
03626 {
03627       UINT32                        uiWorldBombIndex;
03628       UINT32                        uiTimeStamp;
03629       OBJECTTYPE *      pObj;
03630 
03631       uiTimeStamp = GetJA2Clock();
03632 
03633       // Go through all the bombs in the world, and look for timed ones
03634       for (uiWorldBombIndex = 0; uiWorldBombIndex < guiNumWorldBombs; uiWorldBombIndex++)
03635       {
03636             if (gWorldBombs[uiWorldBombIndex].fExists)
03637             {
03638                   pObj = &( gWorldItems[ gWorldBombs[uiWorldBombIndex].iItemIndex ].o );
03639                   if ( pObj->bDetonatorType == BOMB_TIMED && !(pObj->fFlags & OBJECT_DISABLED_BOMB) )
03640                   {
03641                         return( gWorldBombs[uiWorldBombIndex].iItemIndex );         
03642                   }
03643             }
03644       }
03645 
03646       return( -1 );
03647 }
03648 
03649 BOOLEAN ActiveTimedBombExists( void )
03650 {
03651       if ( gfWorldLoaded )
03652       {
03653             return( FindActiveTimedBomb() != -1 );
03654       }
03655       else
03656       {
03657             return( FALSE );
03658       }
03659 }
03660 
03661 void RemoveAllActiveTimedBombs( void )
03662 {
03663       INT32 iItemIndex;
03664 
03665       do
03666       {
03667             iItemIndex = FindActiveTimedBomb();
03668             if (iItemIndex != -1 )
03669             {
03670                   RemoveItemFromWorld( iItemIndex );
03671             }
03672       } while( iItemIndex != -1 );
03673       
03674 }
03675 
03676 UINT8 DetermineFlashbangEffect( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 ubExplosionDir, BOOLEAN fInBuilding)
03677 {
03678       INT8 bNumTurns;
03679       UINT16 usHeadItem1, usHeadItem2;
03680       
03681       bNumTurns   = FindNumTurnsBetweenDirs(pSoldier->bDirection, ubExplosionDir);
03682       usHeadItem1 = pSoldier->inv[ HEAD1POS ].usItem;
03683       usHeadItem2 = pSoldier->inv[ HEAD2POS ].usItem;
03684       
03685       // if soldier got in explosion area check if he is affected by flash
03686       // if soldier wears sun goggles OR grenade behind him OR
03687       //    (he is not underground AND it is day AND he is outdoor)
03688       if ( (usHeadItem1 == SUNGOGGLES || usHeadItem2 == SUNGOGGLES) || (bNumTurns > 1) ||
03689             (!gbWorldSectorZ && !NightTime() && !fInBuilding) )
03690       {
03691             // soldier didn't see flash or wears protective sungogles or outdoor at day, so he is only deafened
03692             return ( FIRE_WEAPON_DEAFENED );
03693       }
03694 
03695       return ( FIRE_WEAPON_BLINDED_AND_DEAFENED );
03696 }
